title: Jalan jalan

text:
Ketiga kalinya menginap di Orchardz Bandara. Pelayanan sangat ramah dan memuaskan. Saat check-in resepsionis menanyakan jam keberangkatan keesokaan harinya, setengah jam sebelum bus antar-jemput berangkat, resepsionis mengingatkan tamu melalui telepon. 

Kamar bersih dan nyaman, AC dan water heater berfungsi dengan baik. 

Breakfast juga enak.

Setiap menginap disini, dijemput oleh pak Davi. Sangat kooperatif, fast respons, dan tepat waktu👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻
title: Excellent!!

text: Assalamualaikum.wr wb...sore saya salah satu jamaah umroh yang stay di hotel kawasan bandara Soekarno-Hatta di Orchard hotel , ada fasilitas antar jemput gratis dengan pelayanan ramah sopan santun dalam mengarahkan titik penjemputan dengan mas Muhajir... setibanya kami sampai di hotel pelayanan ramah resepsionis nya, kamar nya bersih,luas dengan harga yang terjangkau serta breakfast nya luar biasa jam 3 pagi sudah siap... Alhamdulillah pokoknya recommended banget...!!!

text:

title: Menginap hotel terbaik

text:
Hotel orchard bandara bagi saya, amat sgt rekomended
Tempat yg strategis, dekat dgn bandara
Pegawai nya ramah ramah
Dan yg utama bagi saya
Armada penjemputan yg flexible, drivernya ramah ramah,  begitu kita landing, langsung telpon hotel dan tinggal tunggu armadanya

title: Hotel.paling rekomended buat transit di bandara soekarno hatta

text:
Orchardz bandara emg top mantab sekali buat perjalanan umroh.sblm brgkt mampir dlu d hotel ini. Sangat iatimewa dr pelayannya. Trimakasih pk zebua dh bantu sya bawain kopernya.
Makanannya jg enak enak chef firman than u pak.sukses trus.

title: Nice transit

text:
Kami tiba dr bandung ke orchardz bandara pukul 04.00 subuh.
Rasa ngantuk kami hilang ketika turun dri bis, disambut dg hangat dan d lgsg d arahkn k musola u melksankn solat subuh.mushola yg luas dan bersih cukup buat kami rombongan umroh 1 bis.
Stlh slesai sholat kami lgsg d arahkn k ruangan breakfast u sarapan pagi. Luar biasa bpk asga yg sdh sambut kami dg penuh senyum. Juga bpk aripudin yg stay d omlet byak menawarkn aneka makanan.... Free free kata nya. Kami yg tdinya gugup jdi merasa hotel ini sprti rumah sndiri. Hingga pukul 06.00 pagi  d sambut hangat oleh dede muslima w. yg gk bosen bosen menyapa kami untuk mempersilahkan menambah... Baiknya y Allah.jdi betah sy gk mau pulang.
Sehat sehat kalian y bapak,ibu,adek. Semoga berkah. 
Syukron orchardz bandara. Maju trus sukses.
title: Pengalaman yang tak terlupakan

text:
Hotel yg bagus,rapih dan nyaman. Pelayanannya good. Makanannya enak enak. Tdk mengurangibkhas indonesia. Terimakasih pak aripudin pelayanan omlety ramah,responsif dan tdk malu antarkn k table kami. Juga sukses buat chef firman udah menyajikan makanan super nikmat d makan breakfastnya. Dan kk training dede muslima wati smoga kau bisa mncapai cita citamu dek. Salam hangat dr kami skeluarga.
Thanks orchardz bandara kelak akan mampir kmbali.

text: Kamar yang nyaman,bersih, luas untuk hotel bintang 3. Fasilitas lengkap sesuai grade. Sangat cocok di rekomendasikan ke saudara, teman, dengan harga yang wajar. Thanks buat pak Wawan driver yang telah mengantar saya ke bandara.

title: hotel bagus di sekitar bandara Soekarno Hatta

text:
Salah satu hotel transit di sekitar Bandara Soeta. 
1. Lokasi
    Dekat bandara, di sekitar ada tempat makan seperti warung padang, Bersebelahan dengan hotel Amaris dan di sebelahnya lagi ada Swisbel. Perjalanan dari bandara ke hotel ini lebih lama daripada sebaliknya. Jadi sangat cocok untuk hotel transit. Di hotel juga disediakan shuttle menuju bandara dengan jadwal setiap jam. Jangan lupa mendaftar dulu supaya dapat kepastian kursi.
2. Breakfast
    Pilihan breakfast dan rasanya biasa saja. Tapi satu catatan menarik, breakfast sudah tersedia sejak jam 4 pagi. Yap, memang suatu fasiltas khusus dari hotel ini untuk melayani pelanggannya yang harus berangkat pagi menuju bandara.
3. Saluran tv
    Karena memang hotel untuk transit, pilihan saluran tv di hotel ini sedikit dan cenderung biasa saja.
4. Harga
    Harganya menengah/rata-rata, yah wajarlah dengan fasilitas yang tersedia.
5. Kenyamanan kamar
    Pada saat masuk kamar, kamar kondisi panas. Pas coba nyalain ac, ternyata ac nya mati. Kemudian panggil petugas, dan akhirnya ac bisa nyala kembali. Kamarnya cukup kecil, begitu juga kamar mandinya. Lumayan bersih.

Overall, hotel ini rata-ratalah. Memang konsepnya hotel transit.
title: Transit to Malaysia

text:
Mungkin karena jadi Hotel Transit yah .. saya tidak merasakan atmosfer yang bersahabat dari staffnya yang kaku dalam pelayanan. 

Receptionis Welcome banget menerima kita saat check-in, walaupun tempat tenang, luas dan adem tapi saat selesai sarapan pagi baru berasa “gerah” ketika ingin menikmati Kopi Pagi dengan suasana santai sambil ngerokok 🙈 

Saya perokok berat dan terbiasa ngerokok sehabis sarapan plus kopi panasnya. 

“Gak boleh bawa kopi ke smooking area pak!”
“Bapak Order lagi, nanti kita antar kesana”

Smooking area letaknya diteras hotel yang hanya dipisahkan kaca tanpa pintu menuju smooking area dan harus lewat pintu keluar hotel.

Yah apa boleh buat, Ngopi diluar paket breakfast-nya bagi perokok seperti saya.

title: Nyaman sekali..

text:
Saya sekeluarga menginap di satu hari sebelum Idul Fitri tahun ini, saat rate hotel sedang tinggi-tingginya hotel ini menawarkan rate yang sangat terjangkau tapi sangat valuable.

Kami mengambil type kamar tertinggi seharga type standar hotel lain di sekitarnya, saat tiba di hotel pelayanan front office sangat ramah.

Kamar sangat luas dengan kamar mandi yang juga sangat luas anak saya suka itu.

Makanan di resto juga sangat enak untuk makanan hotel baik breakfast maupun layanan antar ke kamar.

Minimarket tidak jauh dari lokasi hotel begitu pula rumah makan di luar juga tidak terlalu jauh dapat ditempuh dengan jalan kaki.

Sebagai hotel dengan konsep transit bandara menyediakan breakfast mulai pukup 03.00 pagi adalah sesuatu yang sangat brilian, banyak tamu hotel yang akan penerbangan pagi sangat terbantu dengan konsep ini, termasuk juga dengan free shuttle ke bandara untuk antar jemput yang meskipun sesuatu yang sepele namun dirasakan sangat membantu tamu hotel.

Sangat recommended untuk orang yang harus transit ke penerbangan selanjutnya yang agak lama atau tamu yang akan terbang pagi tapi takut terkena kemacetan bisa menginap disini karena jaraknya yang sangat dekat dengan bandara.

Bila akan terbang pagi lagi bersama keluarga saya pasti akan menginap disini lagi.
title: Best Value Transit Hotel in Soetta Airport

text: Untuk kelas hotel transit, ruangannya luas,kamar bersih,kmr mandi luas,bersih,nyaman,kasur luas dan empuk, hanya saja sarung bantalnya kasar,sptnya sdh waktunya diganti baru😊.Sayangnya istirahat kami agak terganggu dgn suara lemari es yg kenceng banget. Mungkin pas kebetulan saja lemari es yg dikmr kami lg trouble.Untuk breakfast lumayan lah.Tersedia shuttle bus ke/dr bandara,tiap 1jam,so nggak perlu repot pakai taxi, free, angkutan nyaman,sopirnya jg ramah.Posisi hotel strategis,mau kuliner dekat,tinggal jln kaki ke foodcourt yg berada di satu lokasi dgn Swiss Belhotel Bandara,yg ada di seblh hotel, ada mini mall juga disana,sygnya krn waktu menginap disana pas hari Raya Idul Fitri hari pertama jadi food courtnya ttp,tk-tk didalam mallnya juga banyak yang ttp.Oya diseblh hotel Orchardz,ada Rm.Padang enak lho,namanya Rm  Padang Roda Pedati, dan lagi2 krn lebaran Rm.langganan kami juga libur. Deket hotel juga banyak minimarket.Jarak dari bandara cm 15menit dengan mobil.So secara keseluruhan, kami nyaman stay di Orchardz Hotel Airport,next kl kita traveling lagi, bisa nginep lg disana.

Aznan Adviis Ardiyansyah
title: Ramah dan bersahabat

text: Hotel dekat bandara Soekarno-Hatta yang sangat cocok untuk transit. Menyediakan shuttle bus dari hotel ke airport. Kamar luas dan bersih. Menu sarapan variatif dan enak. Petugas hotel ramah dan helpful.
title: Hotel Transit yang Nyaman

text:
Ini pertama kali saya menginap di Hotel sekitar bandara. Saya memilih hotel ini karena adanya fasilitas shuttle bus. Lokasi hotel memang agak ramai karena persis depan jalan tol dan lalu lintas jalannya ramai sekali. Kebetulan saya dapat kamar di lantai 9, sehingga bisa melihat pemandangan bandara dari atas, kamar luas dan nyaman. KM juga ok sekali walaupun amenities tidak terlalu lengkap, tidak masalah.
Namun sayang sering terdengar suara bising dari kamar sebelah / gudang hotel. Cukup mengganggu.

Sayang sekali pengalaman saya diawali dengan hal yang tidak menyenangkan. Saya sudah 2x menelpon FO minta informasi masalah masjid terdekat untuk melaksanakan sholat jumat, dan dijawab ada k.l. 100 mtr. Namun rekan saya tidak bisa menemukannya dan akhirnya harus berjalan k.l. 2 km untuk ke mesjid yang lebih besar. Kalau mau naik taxi diminta mahal sekali. Dari pihak hotel juga tidak ada yang membantu. Sehingga rekan saya pulang dari mesjid dengan kondisi yang lelah sekali dan kepanasan.
title: Hotel transit yang nyaman dan ramah

text: saya nginep disini bru 1x dan rasa nya ingin nginep lgi, saya di ajak oleh teman2 awalnya masih kurang yakin cmn pas udh nginep semalem berasa nyaman dan puas banget, service nya bagus, fasilitasnya juga bagus :)
title: hotel mewah

text:
Kamar Sangat Besar. Pelayanan cukup bagus. 2 malam transit disana cukup ok.
Hanya saja susah kendaraan disana. Mau cari taksi rata2 tembak harga sewa. 

Untuk sarapan saya tidak tahu rasanya. Tapi untuk order food ke kamar. Semuanya kurang. Juice juga kurang fresh buahnya. 
Pangsit goreng dan calamari agak bau isinya. 
Pisang goreng juga kayanya minyaknya bekas beberapa kali pakai.

Untuk food kurang recommend. Untuk yang lain sudah ok. 

Ada shuttle untuk ke bandara juga.
title: Not Bad

text:
Hotel ini sangat dekat dengan bandara, hanya perlu 5 menit untuk menuju bandara. Ada shuttle bus dari dan menuju bandara Soekarno Hatta yang berangkat setiap satu jam sekali. 

Sarapan cukup enak, harga sesuai dengan kantong.
title: Hotel yang dekat dengan bandara Soekarno Hatta Jakarta

text:
+ free antar jemput shuttle bandara
+ kamar paling luas dibanding dengan hotel sekitar bandara lain ny
+ furnite kamar ok dgn full HPL
+ sarapan bervariasi
+ dekat convenience store

- high price
- lobby kecil
title: pilihan terbaik hotel bandara

text: Menginap untuk mengikuti penerbangan lanjutan esok hari, kamar nyaman, menu breakfast yang lumayan enak dan bervariasi ada free shuttle dari dan ke bandara soekarno hatta tinggal mendaftar ke receptionist untuk jadwal free shuttle
title: Transit hotel

text: Hotel yang pas untuk transit dulu sebelum melanjutkan penerbangan....apalagi klo flight pagi...tau sendirikan jakarta macet banget kalo pagi...kamarnya cukup luas untuk kelas bintang ***...pilihan sarapan yg lumayan dan handuk selalu wangi...wangi khas orchardz....
title: Transit hotel

text: Hotel masih termasuk baru, dekat dengan airport soekarno hatta, kamar nyaman dan ranjang dan kamar mandi ok, bersih, resepsionis cukup ramah, ada shuttle free ke airport, cocok untuk yang mau terbang dari soekarno hatta
title: Hotel nyaman dan dekat airport

text: Hotel ini menyediakan mobil jemput dan atar ke dan dari soekarno hatta. Breakfast sudah buka pagi pagi sekali, jadi bisa sarapan sebelum ke bandara. Ada mall deket hotel, bisa jalan kaki. Bersih dan tenang
title: Bagus buat transit

text: Hotelnya lumayan simple alias gak ribet dan gak sumpek,bersih nya so oke, gak kecewa kl disana untuk beristirahat sambil menunggu jadwal pesawat, kl dijakarta saya kedatangan tamu,bisa dikatakan 90% nginap disitu
title: Hotel pas buat traveling

text:
Saya kebetulan ambil kamar Deluxe (double gk ada twin). untuk pelayanan dan kebersihan oke.
Hotel ini menyediakan free shuttle kebandara dan dari bandara dari jam 3 pagi. jika anda harus sarapan Hotel ini menyediakan fasilitas sarapan mulai jam 3 pagi. Jadi jika berangkat subuh masih bisa untuk sarapan.
jalan sedikit ada nasi padang dan mall di bwh zest hotel (dcost, jco,dll). Sarapan cukup baik, good management
title: Dekat bandara dan makanan

text:
kelebihan :
- kamar luas, bersih dan nyaman
- free breakfast dan shuttle untuk ke bandara
- staff yang ramah

kekurangan :
untuk hotel yang mempunyai target pasar adalah orang - orang yang transit dalam perjalanan dan lelah sehingga ingin beristirahat yang berkualitas. namun, pada saat saya menginap, di lantai atas kamar saya terdengar bunyi seperti sedang renovasi kamar yang tidak berhenti sampai pagi, sedangkan saya mempunyai flight pagi hari sehingga butuh tidur yang berkualitas, namun tidak bisa saya dapatkan karena suara berisik yang sangat menganggu.
title: tidak sesuai dengan harga yang dibayarkan

text:
Terletak di cengkareng dekat bandara soetta....ada fasilitas shuttle bandara gratis , kamar minimalis, cukup bersih, sarapan cukup banyak menunya.
Tempat spa bagus dan ramai.
Efisien menginap disini jika memiliki connecting flight lama atau jadwal terbang pagi...namun jika memiliki kegiatan di kota jakarta tidak disarankan karena jauh dan tol sering macet
title: Near airport cgk

text:
Satu yang utama dari hotel ini ketika saya membandingkan dengan hotel lainnya yaitu penjemputan dan pengantaran lebih tepat waktu.
Berlokasi di pinggir jalan raya ke bandara, sangat dekat untuk ditempuh. Kalau dari bandara harus memutar untuk ke hotel ini, lain halnya menuju bandara tidak memutar, melainkan langsung ke bandara dan hemat waktu. 
Hotel ini menyediakan layanan spa, resto dan buffet breakfast juga. Dan untuk taksi banyak tersedia di hotel ini. 
Dan untuk budget di hotel ini berkisar 400-600rb an/mlm.
title: Hotel transit *** dekat bandara

text: Saya booking via traveloka untuk Pelayanan bagus, makannya juga enak banget banyak variannya sarapan dimulai jam 3 pagi :) , untuk harga bersaing, vasilitas antar ke bandara sangat membantu dan selalu ada tiap jam,
title: Good

text:
Hotel Orchard bersih, kamarnya wangi dan luas, pelayanannya juga cepat, dan ada layanan anter jemput bandara ke hotel dan hotel ke bandara yg sangat membantu.
Untuk hal transit sangat sangat puas dengan hotel orchard
title: Bermalam untuk transit

text: Mencoba pertama kali hotel ini karena akan transit esok harinya. Proses kedatangan sudah dijemput tepat waktu, dan diantar ke Hotel. Lokasi sebenarnya dekat dengan bandara, namun untuk menuju ke sana, harus memutari jalan tol melewati rawa bokor. Proses check in cepat dan mudah. Kamar cukup luas dibanding hotel sejenis. Fasilitas memadai untuk tinggal transit. Free wifi tersedia, makan pagi dibawa (take away), karena penerbangan pagi. Secara umum hotel bisa menjadi pilihan ketika transit di bandara Soetta.
title: Hotel yang bagus untuk transit

text: Hotel ini persis dipinggir jalan menuju Bandara Cengkareng, waktu tempuh ke Bandara kurang dari 10 menit. Yang saya suka dari hotel ini Kamar yang luas, saran bervariasi, dan yang utama jemput dan antar ke Bandara secara cuma-cuma dan tersedia setiap jam
title: Kamar Luas antar Jemput Bandara Setiap Jam

text:
Ini adalah salah satu hotel yang letakknya sangat strategis jika Anda berkunjung ke Bandung untuk menikmati Jalan Braga yang terkenal. Anda hanya perlu berjalan kaki untuk menikmati suasana Bandung di malam hari. Ada beberapa tempat hiburan malam untuk membuat susasana hati Anda semakin relax.  Beberapa minimarket juga tersedia dan buka 24 jam. Makanan dan minuman bisa dengan Anda mudah temukan di daerah ini. 
Untuk layanan hotel, ada kolam renang yang bisa Anda nikmati bersama keluarga. Layanan makan pagi cukup bervarisasi dan bisa memenuhi selera Anda. 
Ada mall di bawah hotel, meski tidak besar tapi sudah cukup untuk kebutuhan makan dan minum. Ada bioskop juga 
Harga sih termasuk lumayan untuk para budget traveller. Tapi pantaslah untuk ukuran kamar, fasilitas dan lain sebagainya.
title: Pilihan bagus tuk menghemat waktu ke Soekarno Hatta

text:
Hotel yang cukup nyaman untuk singgah dan melepas lelah saat menunggu flight.
Menu makan pagi yang bervariasi dan suasana hotel yang cukup nyaman.
Hotel Ochardz juga menyediakan settle bus ke dan dari bandara.
title: Tempat singgah saat anda delayed

text: Hotel ini memiliki kamar yang cukup luas, dengan fasilitas antar jemput dari dan ke bandara Soekarno Hatta mulai dari jam 3 pagi. Breakfast yang ditawarkan beragam, dengan room service yang beragam. Di dekat hotel banyak restoran, warung, dan mini market. Bila anda bepergian berdua, dapat meminta 2 kunci kamar di front desk.
title: Hotel dengan kamar yang luas dengan kemudahan akses ke bandara

text: hotel ini berdampingan dekat hotel POP,swiss bell, dekat bandara dan mempunyai suttle bus gratis setiap jam nya, sarapan paginya banyak variasi makanannya dan rasanya lumayan, recommen untuk menginap di hotel ini lagi sebagai transit atau menunggu untuk mencapai bandara dengan mudah dikarenakan jakarta yang sangat macet
title: hotel strategis dan ada suttle bus ke bandara

text:
Kamar sangat nyaman. Fasilitas seperti hai dryer pun ada. Saya menginap disni agar tidak terburu buru ke bandara untuk penerbangan pagi. Namun makanan take away jauh berbeda dengan review sarapan langsung yang rata rata memuaskan. 
Ada baiknya jika sempat, jangan minta take away makanan tapi langsung sarapan di tempat agar tidak waste the money
title: Sarapan take away kurang menarik

text: Pertama saya datang ke hotel ini awalnya biasa saja...tetapi setelah saya bertemu dengan recepcionist bernama putri sy d sambut dengan senyuman manis,dan sy d berikan pelayan yg bagus sm dngan lainnya....restoran nya pun smua staffnya bersahabat dan suka sekali menghibur terutama bapak aang...terima kasih orchardz.
title: Suasana hotel yg oke

text: Menginap 1 malam agar tidak buru-buru karena flight pagi. Yang TOP adalah makanannya, saya pesan soto betawinya TOP banget deh salut buat chef nya. Kalo room standard ya, bersih dan yg bagus adalah handuknya wangi. Shuttlenya juga OK dari dini hari ampe jam 12 siang ada terus tiap jam.
title: 5 Stars Food

text: Bagi yang akan malakukan perjalanan dengan penerbangan awal hotel ini cukup baik, dengan layanan antar gratis di setiap jam nya. Pelayanan ramah, kamar luas, fasilitas cukup baik (terdapat hairdryer dikamar mandi--sangat membantu terutama bagi wanita), harga terjangkau. Karena datang saat bulan puasa ternyata menu untuk sahur sama seperti menu sarapan biasa yang cukup lengkap.
title: menyenangkan

text: Hotel ini terletak sangat dekat dengan bandara, walaupun aksesnya dari bandara ke hotel ini cukup panjang, namun untuk berangkat dari hotel ini ke bandara sangat dekat sekali. tersedia shuttle service bandara-hotel-bandara. kamar cukup luas dan menyenangkan, harga juga cukup terjangkau.
title: Hotel Transit

text:
Saya menginap di hotel ini saat mau berangkat ke Paris. Tiba di bandara cengkareng sore hari dan pagi-pagi sekali berangkat lagi. Lokasi hotel dekat dengan bandara. Dilengkapi dengan fasilitas antar jemput dari bandara ke hotel... dan semuanya Free!. Walaupun saya sendiri, mereka tetap menjemput saya dengan ramah. Pagi-pagi jam 4 saya dan rombongan sudah siap diantar ke bandara. Hanya beberapa menit perjalanan ke Bandara. Kalau perjalanan dari bandara ke hotel memang harus berputar dan agak sedikit lama. 

Hotel ini punya fasilitas yang lengkap..bukan sekedar hanya untuk transit semata. Kamarnya bersih dan bagus, tenang. Shower kamar mandinya sangat kencang sehingga bisa enak saat mandi. Karena saya tidak sempat breakfast, pihak hotel menyiapkan roti yang bisa dibawa/dibungkus untuk bekal di perjalanan/pesawat. 

Saya puas dengan pelayanan hotel ini.
title: Hotel Transit dengan pelayanan yang Memuaskan!

text: Secara keseluruhan hotel ini sangat nyaman, sayangnya waktu saya datang sama sekali tidak disambut oleh roomboy hngga saya membawa koper sendirian menuju kamar. Lokasi yang setrategis dan dekat dengan bandara, sangat disarankan untuk anda yang akan terbang keesokan harinya untuk menginap di sini.
title: Hotel mewah nan nyaman

text:
Tempatnya enak, bersih, dan tersedia transportasi gratis ke Bandara. Jarak ke bandara juga sangat dekat (sekitar 5 menit), jadi cocok kalau kita naik penerbangan pagi atau transit.
Kekurangannya, kemarin pas menginap disana, saya kehabisan makanan, dan restok makanannya juga lama, akhirnya makan yang ada aja, tapi overall tempatnya enak kok, terlebih kalo masalah makanan diperbaiki.
title: Nice

text: Kamar luas (serius luas), wifi gratis. Tersedia antar jemput bandara gratis. Menu sarapan bervariasi, dan jika anda cek out subuh akan ditawarkan sarapannya dibungkus. Pelayanan pegawai bagus dan ramah. Uniknya hotel ini punya SPA dan massage di lantai 2, dengan biaya tersendiri tentunya.
title: Hotel budget daerah bandara yang memuaskan

text:
Hotel ini memiliki keunggulan di banding dengan hotel-hotel transit lainnya sekitar bandara Soekarno-Hatta adalah karena letaknya yang strategis. Perjalanan dari bandara ke hotel ini cukup lancar karena tidak perlu memutar ke daerah macet. Juga perjalanan dari hotel ini ke bandara cukup sekitar 15 menit sudah tiba.

Pelayanannya ramah. Kamar hotelnya cukup luas. Amenitis dan komplimentari lainnya standard dan lumayan. Dukup menyenangkan untuk hotel transit. Pelayanan shuttle transportnya juga menyenangkan dan tepat waktu.

Satu yang perlu diperhatikan adalah, ternyata hotel ini cuma memiliki 1 lantai saja kamar no-smoking. Jadi ketika saya meminta kamar no smoking, kamar sudah tidak tersedia karena lantai itu sudah penuh semuanya.

Untuk manajemen hotel, mungkin harus dipikirkan untuk menambah kapasitas kamar no smoking.
title: Non smoking room cuma 1 lantai

text: Di antara banyak hotel transit di dekat bandara Soekarno-Hatta, Orchardz hotel tidak terlihat terlalu istimewa dari tampak luarnya. Hotelnya terlihat masih baru dan "polos". Kami biasanya transit di Sheraton namun saat itu penuh hingga harus mencari hotel lain, lalu tibalah kami di hotel ini. Untuk harga yang jauh lebih murah Orchardz hotel masih membawa kesan bersih dan mewah untuk harga yang ditawarkan. Kamarnya juga cukup luas dengan kasur yang nyaman untuk sekedar menunggu penerbangan. Check in dan check out berlangsung cepat. Lokasinya juga hanya 10 menit dari airport sehingga sangat praktis.
title: Tidak terkesan murah

text:
audit terakhir ke jakarta termasuk biz trip yang sangat singkat,  dan bila mau menginap di hotel yang tempat tidur nyaman serta sarapan yg yummy dengan harga yang on budget.. nginap di orchardz .. tempat startegis dekat bandara serta ada shuttle-nya sejak jam 3 pagi sampe sore, dan bisa minta bantuan petugas untuk morning call
dan yang terpenting kamar mandinya bersih ..
title: Hotel dekat bandara dengan bfast yg yummy

text: Lokasi hotel sangat strategis dekat bandara Soekarno-Hatta, dengan waktu tempuh sekitar 10 menit dengan mobil. Hotel relatif baru, dan juga relatif lebih baik dari pada hotel transit lain disekitar. Kamar cukup luas, bersih dan nyaman. Harga cukup terjangkau serta disediakan shuttle bus airport - hotel. Sangat membantu bagi traveller yang harus check in di pagi hari agar tidak tertinggal pesawat.
title: Hotel transit dengan fasilitas lebih

text: Hotel ini sangat strategis krn dekat dgn bandara. Harganya murah, hotel baru. kamarnya nyaman. Enaknya ada shuttle bus ke Bandara dan gratis. Saya dan seorang teman sempat menginap disini karena dari luar kota sampai Jakarta sudah ham 23.00 sementara besok pagi jam 9 sdh harus ke bandara. Jadi pas, dengan kamar yg baru, bisa istirahat sejenak dan pagi2 siap ke bandara.
title: Hotel yang Strategis

text:
Karena maaih baru, maka kondisi fasilitas cukup diperhatikan.
Hanya saja agak jauh menjangkaunya bila anda datang dari arah Bandara Soekarno-Hatta dikarenakan harus berputar cukup jauh.
Hotel ini tidak memiliki fasilitas kolam renang dan akses wifi cukup lambat saat saya stay di sini. Jendela kamar juga cukup tipis sehingga deru pesawat dan mesin mobil cukup terdengar. Tips penting: jangan berbincang terlalu keras di dekat jendela, karena ada semacam celah carpot yang memungkinkan orang dari atas dan bawah mendengar pembicaraan anda.
title: Relatif Murah dan Masih Baru

text: Very unprofessional and bad service. Time that should be used is the real time, not hotel‘s own time. Shuttle service is not good. The time that the shuttle went is not the same as mentioned from the Front Desk.
title: Not thrilled with the service. Operating in their own time?

text: Free airport shuttle.  Super clean.  Modern.  Great room for the price.  Caters to airport travellers so it was exactly what we want.  For example: fast checkin, bellhops to help with luggage from shuttle and to room, free breakfast and breakfast starts at 2:30am!!!  Shuttles all night.  Only 10 minutes to airport (but be aware there are 3 terminals and others may get dropped off before you).
title: Great airport hotel

text: Quite close to airport,very good hotel for transit. The breakfast was delicious its Indonesian foods. The staff are helpful. A comfy bed. Hair drier available. If you are looking for a good budget hotel within airport area, this is definitely a good choice.
title: good hotel for transit

text:
Stayed as I had an early flight. The rooms are big but simple. A comfy bed, some basic amenities, kettle and coffee/ tea. The bathroom is spacious , good water pressure shower head. Hair drier available including basic amenities.
The staff is attentive, helpful.I had dinner, at the Ritz restaurant/cafe , simple local food. The breakfast again, local food, some bakery, egg station, fruits, but I feel ti could be better. A convenient hotel for an overnight but nothing to see around.
title: Convenient to the airport

text: Conveniently located opposite of Terminal 3 of Soekarno-Hatta Int Airport. However quite a hassle to reach there by road. The fly over is under construction and give yourself 20 to 30 minutes on hotel shuttle bus from T3 to hotel. Also give yourself another 20 to 30 minutes of waiting time for the shuttle bus at Gate 1 of T3. Call the hotel in arrival so the hotel staff is there to assist. Make sure your reservation is reconfirmed. Inspite of our reservation by the company, we were stranded at the hotel check in counter. Having booked 2 rooms but we were given one only after long chat. The hotel room is comfortable but the towel is smelly and pillow cases are smoky as i was given smoking room inpite of having made reservation for non-smoking room. Quite a hassle after a long journey and arriving at night.
title: Convenient Transit Hotel

text: The room is very comfortable and the price is affordable. Arrived on 12 am and only waited less than 15 minutes for shuttle bus to arrive (call before flight departure and upon arrival), can directly check in, iron provided (ask at counter), all necessary toiletries provided too. Check out during early morning is possible and shuttle bus available as early as 4 AM. Breakfast provided vary according to days. The local Indonesian food taste super good. Wifi connection is good.
title: Clean room, variety breakfast, free airport shuttle, easy check in and check out

text:
Pros are efficient free airport shuttle and room was relatively clean. 
Cons are seeing a lower price advertised in the lobby and then failing to give you that, slightly dated room, no Western food on evening menu, and, upsettingly, serving a vegetarian chicken sausage hidden in an omelette at breakfast. I think the concept is fairly unknown. Very pissed off.

Also have stayed at FM7 nearby and it was worth the extra 150k. Much better.
title: Not great

text: Very good transit hotel near Jakarta International Airport.front office, Restaurant,house keeping all staff and shuttle service drivers are really helpful and providing an excellent service to guests. Lovely Spa and extremely friendly girls making us totally relaxed with their therapy. I always love to stay in this hotel when I travel to Sukarno hatta International airport in Jakarta.
title: Best Transit hotel in Jakara

text:
Everything met with expectations location near the airport. Room was big and clean enough. Hot shower with good water pressure. 
Provided free ride from and to the airport. Nothing to complain we just stayed there for less than 12 hours.
title: Nice transit hotel

text: I like spending time here, I got a quite big room which is great. The service is also excellent as usual. The pickup service was good, the breakfast was good, the staffs were good. But I'm very disappointed with the smell of tabacco smoke along the hallway in front of my room.
title: Quite a nice transit hotel

text: We stayed here for one night in transit and it was perfectly comfortable with a good breakfast and free airport pick up/drop-off. They also happily changed our room as it was a bit close to the very noisy lift. The reason this doesn't get five stars is that a quick Google shows that this hotel also has a men's 'spa' which is just an icky idea. To be fair, if we hadn't known beforehand we wouldn't have even realised. Anyway, if this ends up being your option, it is fine.
title: Decent airport option except for the 'spa'

text: They picked me up from domestic terminal. Fast check in process with good internet. Room is spacious with good working station. Staff were attentive. Speak good english. Very comfy bed and pillows. Food service was also excellent. Would check in in this hotel again if i needed to be at the airport quickly
title: Excellent service

text: Located near to Soetta Airport, would be great for overnight transiter... Spacious room, if only cleaner.. airCon is not cool enough.. in overall, this place really need to be cleaned properly i guess
title: Need maintenance

text: Stayed there only for transit, start by the free shuttle pick up from the airport, it was on time, the airport rep was very helpful and polite, the check in process was really nice, the receptionist was so thoughtful asking about the morning call and the airport transfer. The room was very nice, clean..the breakfast start at 3 am which is wonderful for morning flight, and its very tasty indeed. Definitely will come back. Keep up the good work!!! Thank you
title: Excellent

text:
***
Conveniently located and functional 3 star hotel for a layover. Clean rooms, and wifi works!
Have free airport shuttle!
They have a spa that is worth checking out particularly if you are a single guy!
title: 1-1/2 km from international airport

text:
Good hotel friendly staff, the have early morning breakfast started on 3 am. 
They also have airport shuttle so very helpful for the one who choose this hotel for transit
Simple breakfast but still good
Distance to airport are closed, but the way to this hotel is not close because we have to take circle way to  reach this hotel
Anyway still good for me
title: Good transit hotel

text:
Simple hotel, does most things right. Big advantage right outside the airport ON THE CORRECT SIDE OF THE ROAD!

This is important, even with horrible traffic you know it's a maximum 20 minute trip to any of the terminals. If you get a hotel on the other side of the road, you can take up to an hour to get back to the terminal.
title: Simple, great location

text:
We got a very good deal. Paid CAD54 for a spacious clean cozy room. Breakfast didn't have many choices however taste was good. Shuttle service was excellent. Workers were great.
For hotel closed to jakarta airport this one is the best for us so far.
Highly recommended for any traveler who needs to stay close to the airport....
title: A pleasant stay

text:
Nice hotel with good facilities in the room and big bathroom.. 
I took the Deluxe room plus an Extra Bed. And the room still have a spacious area even there was an Extra bed. The bathroom so big with a complete amenities..
The service was good and the staff are really helpful..
Breakfast was good with so many choices.. And they keep fill in the foods until the breakfast time over.
This hotel was recommended and i Will come back when i need to stay near the airport area..
title: Nice...

text: Friendly smiling staff was waiting for me once I exited the terminal arrival hall and  prearranged shuttle bus pick up was at no extra cost... Reception staff was friendly and efficient. Room spacious and clean even though toiletries were of a minimum.Bed was very comfortable  No alcohol in the room fridge, your have to get a beer from the restaurant. ..  Not much to do in the neighborhood, there a small shopping mall near by.. Starbucks, KFC & a few restaurants .. as, this is a transit hotel you will have early morning foot traffic and voices...  get a room higher floor and away from the lifts
title: Good Transit Hotel

text: the hotel is quite near to the airport. they also provide shuttle bus service. the restaurant for breakfast is nice. the bedroom is average, sadly i got the cigarette smell in my room. but, i patiently accept it because i only stay for one night.
title: very near to airport

text: I like the staff here. They are very friendly and helpful, though some of them cannot speak English well. The hotel itself is quite modern and clean. The bathroom is clean. The bedroom is OK, but there is little dust on the bed. Facility is good. Food is so-so, I recommend the hotel put the name of food in English so that customers can know what it is, as some customers cannot eat beef. Around the hotel has a lot of stores, a food court nearby, and many convenient stores too.
title: Friendly Hotel

text: It was my second time stay in this hotel. I stayed for 1 night (8 Feb 2017) because i had early schedule on 9. I checked in at 8 pm, the receptionist was quite polite and friendly. I got non smoking room at 7 floor, the room was  comfortable for rest. This hotel also had spa and sauna services, you could get any traditional massage here. The restaurant opened at 3 am, all food provided was tastefully. I also got a free transport to airport by shuttle bus on 4 am (scheduled every 1 hour after 3 am). Have a nice rest here.. Rio
title: Good Hotel to Transit

text:
If you need a hotel near the airport, this is a great choice. I emailed them to ask about a shuttle as I was arriving around 1 am. They emailed back and explained where to get the shuttle. I waited a bit but all in all, it was a great deal - free shuttle, friendly staff, and easy to get too (about 15 minutes by shuttle). 

If you want a hotel for sightseeing in Jakarta this would not be convenient, as the hotel is far from the city. But I would recommend this for a night before an early flight, or a place to sleep when you arrive late. Also, it seems they are set up for people landing late in Jakarta and going back out on early flights.
title: Clean room, convenient to airport, helpful staff!

text: Brothel Hotel spa. Not suitable for couples. One of the worst hotel I have been.Foods taste great though. Buffet from 3am so thats nice. Only city view no airport view. Impossible to find hotel from google maps unless you got a driver who is aware of roads in indonesia.
title: Bad

text: The facilities of this hotel were great, the price was very very good. This hotel is very good for those who wants to travel who needs to stay within the airport area. And also this hotel provide shuttle bus for free to the airport every 1 hour.
title: Great hotel within airport area

text:
if you need a room for a transit while you are in Jakarta International Airport, Orchardz Hotel should be on of the choices. The room is spacious, clean, the food is good, the staffs are friendly.
you can ask a morning call service if your flight is at very early morning.
This hotel provides a shuttle service to all terminal at Sukarno Hatta International Airport Jakarta.
The rate is reasonable.
title: Great location and service for a Transit Hotel

text: Stayed at Orchardz since this is one of the few hotels directly on the freeway going to the airport. Check in process was quick, but they didn't mentioned that they need a bit more time for processing credit cards during check-out, fortunately have enough time for the process before boarding the hotel's shuttle bus going to the airport. Rooms were average, with showers only, but has good amenities like flat screen TV and safe, and the ambience is nice and modern. I mistakenly plugged a 110V rated extension cord to their regular 220V receptacle that tripped the whole room's electricity; and they were quick to come over and reset the system again. Breakfast was available from 3 AM; we had breakfast at 3:30 AM and checking out right after, to be able to catch the 4 AM shuttle bus for our 6 AM flight. Breakfast was OK, mostly Indonesian fares (rice porridge, noodles, fried rice) and some bread and pastry choices. Service was fine and there's nothing outstanding here. Shuttle bus takes only 10-15 minutes to get to the farthest terminal (Terminal 3) at the airport.
title: Nice Transit hotel

text:
It is a good hotel for transit, only 5 minute from airport. As an airport hotel, this hotel gives free shuttle bus service from/to airport. The price is reasonable and you can get discount if you use one of travel application by booking altogether with flight. If you come from Jakarta, this hotel can be easily accessed by using Damri bus. Because Damri always stop in front of the hotel.

The room & bathroom are clean, well maintained and odorless. Its a good place to stay. Breakfast are okay for me, not special.
title: Good hotel near airport

text:
I stayed in this hotel after flying from Sorong and  catching late afternoon flight to 
Singapore. 
Hotel is near to airport. good connectivity.
Free airport pickup and drop facility is there.
I just landed  in terminal-3 called the hotel bus driver (no given in website) through the  airport enquiry countour. I was asked to wait near gate no4 . within 10 minuts van came. It was  hassle free.
The property  is good maintained. Rooms are big enough.  Bathroom was good with enough hot water and toliteries.
Since the hotel is near airport transit passanger  crowd is more. you can expect from morning 3 Am  activity starts.
The front desk is welcoming with a smile and  quick to allot the room.
The restaurant is good  and reasonably priced. One can have  dinner with 200k.
Break fast is ok with assorted indonesian and  pastries. 
Staff were help ful.
One can consider  for a stay in while flying out.
title: Best hotel for a night stay value for money deal

text: Once again we are in Jakarta and once again we are staying here,really friendly staff very helpful, free pick up to and from airport, ( you must pre book) rooms are great beds are big very clean room /en suite bathroom, very nice buffet style breakfast with plenty choice and omelette cooked fresh to order in front of you(or fried egg or poached) gave 4stars for here because 2nd visit even showed improvement with regard to food,and that was good first stay here,do try room service really cheap for hotel an pretty good food,all in all well worth it ! (Pics are room 702)
title: 2nd visit in 12 months

text:
I stayed here for one night for a transit. It's a very good hotel, rooms are big and clean. Price is also very reasonable. Hotel actually looks much pricier than what you pay!!
They start breakfast at 3am, so even can catch early flight after having a decent breakfast. Free shuttle is another plus. Free wifi, decent menu for dinner. For me everything was just so perfect that I won't need to search for any other transit hotel in Jakarta :)
title: Comfortable transit stay, free airport shuttle

text:
Decent hotel, staid there while waiting for my flight , only few minutes away from the airport, taxi station is in front of the hotel.
Good restorant , nice rooms, helpfool staf.
I would recomend this hotel for everibothey eho neads a place to rest while waiting for flight.
title: Mr

text:
My opinion is governed by my sole use of this hotel: good budget, clean and comfy place near the airport where i could have some business meetings.
I was picked up from the airport 15 mn after i called the hotel reception. 
Room is clean, Wi-fi is good, large bed, clean water, early breakfast is great despite limited choice which is normal for a 3 stars hotel.

And of course, overall, people are friendly and and nice.

I would highly recommend this hotel for quick business stay as i have no clue about other services that this hotel may offer.
title: Comfy Business Hotel Close to Airport

text: Highly recommended airport hotel only 5-10 min drive from the Jakarta airport, free bus, only ones per hour, but good service. Room was spacious with good bed etc. room service was good, food was actually really tasty, but one of the best in this hotel is to have a breakfast from 3 am with Asian and Western style. Great value for the money.
title: Fantastic quick stay, great value for the money

text:
The Orchardz hotel is conveniently located next to the airport. The ameneties are pretty standard, but also on par with a western hotel. The bathroom is nice (great shower temperature and water pressure) and the bedding is super comfortable. The complimentary breakfast is also very generous. Also, the wifi is very fast and worked 100% of the time during our stay. 

The vibes are very generic. The Orchardz could very well be any hotel in any city. The place could use a little more character. Decorating the lobby might be a place to start.
title: Guaranteed to be comfortable!

text:
We stayed at this hotel after our flight arrived late at night. For the price, an absolutely great hotel.

We did include our flight details (flight number and arrival time) in the reservation, but our flight was delayed. We still went to the pick-up area (second floor) and quickly found the pick-up service for the hotel anyway. Great service.

Checkin was efficient, the room was adequate and breakfast was nice as well (Asian breakfast). Overall, one of the best airport hotels I've stayed at. Would definitely recommend this hotel.
title: Great hotel for a nightstop

text:
Because it cheap and close to the airport. I've stayed here a couple of times now, neither of them at my behest, but because the company I work for keep sending me there. It's ideal for making your way to The airport, as it really is only a quick 3-4 minute shuttle ride to get there. For some bizarre reason however, the shuttle service ceases to function after 3 o'clock in the afternoon! Getting to the hotel from the airport is a different matter. Currently, the main road out of the airport has just one slip road leading to the hotel. This is now closed indefinitely. If you taxi driver doesn't know the secret back way in, it'll take you 45 minutes and two toll gate fees to get there!

It's not westerner friendly IMO, the cuisine is all rice and noodles, no bacon for breakfast. No facilities to speak of, but I have it on good authority that the massage suit offers a 'full range of services'.

Fine for a stopover for those late night or vary early flights home, but don't make it you first place to stay in Indonesia!
title: Why here?

text: This hotel is near the airport, 15 min max. Hotel provides a free shuttle .  My room was clean and comfortable . Nothing fancy but for the price it's a great value. There is a restaurant on site, and room service is offered 24/24. Staff was friendly .
title: Great for the price

text:
Stay here for just one night, since I have to catch early flight on Wednesday morning.

It was a good stay.. Room is fine, breakfast is good and they provide free shuttle to airport, which takes only 10 minutes.

If I need to catch early flight or need an unwind after late night flight. I definitely want to come again.
title: Overnight stay

text: I stay in this hotel for one night only as I have connection flight on next day. I just arrive in jakarta around 9 pm from semarang and the hotel car pick up drop of me to this hotel. This hotel is close to airport ( around 15 minutes by car ). Check in process also do quickly and nice guy for your car driver & receptionist for warm welcome. Breakfast menu on next day morning is completed compare to other hotel which in same budget, the shuttle bus  also ready to drop us to airport. Overall comment , for average budget  hotel nearby to airport, I recommended this hotel. Keep doing your good service !!
title: Good service

text:
Hotel was great value for money.
Service was good,  rooms clean and airport pick up / drop off service great.
I did not have time for breakfast but the restaurant looked reasonable.
In the morning it took 15 minutes to get to the airport terminals
title: Moz

text:
Basic transit hotel, but it covers everything you need... From the pick-up to check out, everything was perfect.

+ Good pick up service. Driver was waiting with a placard (do let them know in advance of your flight details). Driver was also very friendly and had a nice chat on the way in
+ Front desk was efficient. Quick check in and out 
+ Breakfast - basic, but I'm not expecting a Hilton spread. Food was tasty, and sufficient to keep you lasted for the day.
+ Complimentary bottles in the room, and basic amenities in the toilet.
+ Universal plug points 
+ Clean room
+ Free shuttle back to the airport on the hour (and extremely punctual)

There was only one qualm. Although the room was generally clean, there were some stains on the bedsheets.
title: Excellent one night stay!

text: The location is close to the Airport. You can reach the airport in 10 minutes in normal traffic. The room is spacious and comportable. The breakfast is OK. The hotel provides free shuttle bus to the airport every 1 hour (03.00 to 12.00) and from the airport to the hotel (12.30 to 23.30).
title: Fit for passanger who want to catch the flight

text: Ròom standard  with breakfast( 3 menu ,egg station,juice) ready at 5.30. Shuttle bus to airport free every hours available just tell receptionist. Suitable for people who want to travel or transit or just to take a rest for a while.
title: Hotel near airport

text:
I stayed at this hotel for one night, and I love this hotel :)
This hotel is close to the airport so you don't need to rush to the airport , the room and the bathroom are so clean, AC & WiFi worked fine to me!
I checked in at this hotel at 8pm at night, it was a little bit crowded and took a while for the proccess, but overall, I like this hotel, and I will stay here again next time!
title: Clean and Nice hotel to stay!

text: The location is perfect to catch your flight, since this hotel is next to the gate entering the Airport area. Plenty selection for breakfast, mostly Indonesia food. Room is not bad. Water pressure is okay. They also provide free shuttle to the airport.
title: Cheap and adequate for one night stay between flight

text:
breakfast was good, room was pretty decent for budget hotel.  
free wifi and bus to airport, very close to the airport.

i think the biggest downfall is their towel. it didn't absorb water that well and didn't feel that good in your skin.
title: good for very short stay

text:
The price is likely with the others competitor hotel in the airport area but Orchardz made different cz it's very clean, comfort and have a nice facilities.
the location is very perfect for you who will going to the airport cz it is in the direct way.
title: Luxorious Hotel for only one night

text:
im often late to catchup plane or must fly early flight, so the best choice is to stay at budget hotel near bandara that cost not much, because we only sleep here. and i already try all hotel nearby, but i find this place is the top notch, there nothing like budget at all. the room size, the bathroom, the desain and accsesories all doesnt seem like other budget hotel. so it really comfort me. they have shuttle (ofcourse all of the hotel near bandara have) but one thing that i feel pleased, is the service all staff since entered the lobby, the restaurant, the ball boy all is quite friendly. i lost my jacket here, and dont have time to search, so i go to the airport with sad. but they find it and keep it for me until my next arrival. 

the other top notch is the breakfast, sot at all like budget hotel. and if we eat dinner here, the food quite delicious and the price not expensive i think it worthed with the taste. keep the good service and every time i need hotel near bandara this place will be my only choice.
title: budget hotel but its doesnt look like budget at all

photos.caption: dining area as well as breakfast
the corridor, nothing like budget hotel. there rugs, light, nice
wooden floor, nice touch, comfy bed
one of my recomendation for diner, fried rice with ribs

text: We stayed here for one night. This hotel is located close to the airport, there's a free shuttle bus. The rooms are clean, the beds large and comfy. Had a really good nasi with shrimps in the restaurant downstairs. The breakfast if fine, toast, fresh eggs and plenty of indonesian food.
title: Perfect hotel for one night

text:
This hotel delivers exactly what it claims to offer....affordable, clean and convenient accommodation very close to the airport.  The rooms are comfortable and well-appointed.  Overall the hotel [rooms and public spaces] is clean and well-maintained
Dinner and breakfast are available and quite good enough for a lay-over.   Staff are attentive and very helpful.  The shuttle to the airport works well, even if it might appear a bit overcrowded
title: good for an early flight

text: stayed one night on transit. hotel looks new. checkin was quick. room size is good. bathroom clean and bright. hot breakfast and varieties available. shuttle pick up from the airport was quick. hotel to airport shuttle every hour from 3 am. had a good rest from continuing our adventure
title: excellent layover stay

text: The hotel located just few kilometers from the Cengkareng International Airport, though you must take a circled path to reach the hotel, make the distance seems longer. For a kind of transit hotel, the Orchardz offers you more than you expected; spacious clean and comfort room, nice staffs and free shuttle.
title: Nice Hotel, free shuttle

text:
Spent one night here as a stopover on our way to Borneo.  Hotel is comfortable for a one night stay- its spotlessly clean, if basic. Large king sized bed and massive shower.

Breakfast is included- mostly Indonesian breakfast but they have bread, jam, juice, 2 cereals, tea/ coffee and an omelette stand as well.

There's an airport shuttle hourly on the hour to the airport and on the half hour from the airport. Taxi from Jakarta airport is about 15,000 or €9.

Check in was swift and friendly.
title: Does the job nicely!

text: An excellent transit hotel for you who want to catch early flights at Soekarno Hatta airport. The room was nice, the breakfast was also nice. However, I smell something bad inside the room. Might be bug or something that wasnt properly cleaned. And one more thing, one of the visitor smoked inside the elevator. I think you should increase your security and your crew to be more alert of your visitor. Smoking inside an elevator is definitely an issue. That person should be fined. And youbas a hotel should have done a better job to prevent this.
title: Excellent Transit Hotel

text:
I stayed here for a short time during 2 flights. I did not expect too much as I experienced in the past for poor services in the transit hotel. And I was very suprised to notice that this hotel provides me much more thanmy expectation.
First, the airport transfers were fast and ontime with the very helpful drivers. It took me only 5 minutes to the airport.
Second, the appearance of the building was clean and fresh as this is a new hotel.
The deluxe room I used was large and the bathroom was also spacious. For me, this is the finest surprise. The room design was also clean and refreshing. I could sleep very well that night.
The breakfast was also excellent. Quite standard but the taste were great.
In summary, I would definetely recomend this hotel for transit.
title: A Surprisingly Excellent Stay For Transit

text:
I usually make two to three trips to Indonesia every year entering via Jakarta.
On the inward trip I try to choose what I would call “luxury” hotels for just one night as a stopover before travelling on to my destination within Indonesia.
Due to the often chaotic state of the Jakarta traffic, my return voyage usually dictates that I stay at a hotel close to Soekarno Hatta airport to ensure I do not miss my flight.
On my recent trip, accompanied by my wife, I decided to use the Ritz Carlton Mega Kuningan on the inward stopover and the Orchardz Bandara on the outward stopover – two hotels at the very opposite ends of the price range and this provide a very interesting comparison. We have stayed at both hotels on previous trips.
The Orchardz is very much a budget hotel – but do not let this fool you as is does what is says it will do in a highly efficient and professional manner. 
Considering the price of the hotel one would expect just the basic but the place is immaculately clean and being a fairly new hotel is extremely well designed at USD 43-26 per night including a very good buffet breakfast and airport drop off this pace is hard to beat especially as it is only 10 minutes from the airport.
This is a fantastic little hotel for those who just want an undisturbed, comfortable, stopover without the frills.
As a comparison, Orchardz Bandara under-promises and over – delivers whilst Ritz Carlton Mega Kuningan over promises and fails miserably!   
Check in and check out at Orchardz was swift, courteous, and efficient. 
I would definitely recommend this hotel and will, hopefully, stay again.
I recommend the higher floors at the side or rear to avoid traffic noise. Also if you are a non-smoker, specify a non-smoking room.
title: Excellent Again

text:
This hotel is quite good
A very nice transit
Good breakfast : there were toast indonesian food porridge
Good service : the receptionist are so polite friendly and welcoming to the guest
And the wifi is so good
Wish there were a car rental service nearby
title: Nice

text: Spent one night here whilst awaiting onward flight next day .. Just 10 minutes by cab from airport , or you can catch comp bus. Good rooms, clean, everything works, secure and good quality breakfast buffet, mostly Indonesian, but with a very good egg station. All in all, for the price, no complaints and would definitely recommend.
title: Transit simply

text:
Although the rooms are small, it’s clean and nice and everything was well maintained. They’ve a small breakfast / lunch / dinner area. The staff is friendly and the hotel is close to the airport. There is FOC Wifi within the hotels premises. Every full hour they’ve a FOC shuttle service to the airport or you take a taxi. Either way, it takes around 10 to 15 minutes to the airport. 

In summary it’s a good and reasonable priced transit / airport hotel.
title: A good airport / transit hotel

text: Located just a few minute from Soekarno-hatta International airport,  this hotel is one of the nearest hotel around the airport.  It has a spacious room equipped with refrigerator,  mini bar, and big screen LCD TV.  You can relax at the spa or just ask the therapist to get to your room.  They provide airport shuttle from and to the airport,  start at 03.00 am until 12.00 pm. Or you use taxi if your connecting flight after that regular time.  The price for this hotel is cheap. But make sure that you book your room a few day in advance, otherwise you have to move to another hotel.
title: Nice transit hotel

text:
reasonably priced hotel close to Jakarta international airport, clean and quiet, although the spa is under average and so is massage.
Taxi should not be more than 30 thousand but most will charge you around 50. still cheaper than going to town centre...
title: good value, good service

text: this hotel a lot better than their first hotel at pontianak..... they improve on all aspect.....very near to airport... but there is nothing sorround hotel....but their spa is really nice.....must try for male traveller..............
title: relaxing massage at hotel

text:
This is my second stay at this hotel. My first stay was good but this time even better. Don't expect to be pampered! This is very much a basic stopover hotel to avoid the massive traffic delays that may occur if one is travelling from a central Jakarta hotel to the airport. Time to the airport is about 20 minutes. However be warned. If one is travelling into Jakarta from this hotel, one is taken on a very long ride around the local industrial area/village. So if you are having to take a pre booked train from the central Jakarta rail station allow AT LEAST one hour. In future I will probably stay at a central Jakarta hotel coming into Indonesia and at this hotel when I leave.
The hotel is very basic but clean and modern. There is no service for taking luggage to ones room. Although If one asks I suppose that the service is available but it is not automatically provided.
The room price is very reasonable. The beds are comfortable and all amenities worked well. We had a room on 7th floor and were not bothered by any noise.

I did not check the free Wi-Fi on computer but it was adequate   for my Samsung S4 to view emails.
The restaurant provides excellent Oriental/local food - If you enjoy your food spicy this is the place for you! 
I will definitely stay here on my trips to Indonesia but only for outgoing.
title: Good Stopover Hotel

text: Stayed overnight having flown in internationally and out again the next day to Yogyakarta. Left the airport not quite knowing how to find the advertised shuttle pick up point. Was willing to catch a taxi. But alas. There was adriver with my name on it waiting. A very pleasant surprise. Straight to the hotel. Seamless check in. A room of a quality much more than I was expecting for the price. Comfortable bed. Clean throughout. Good water pressure and heat. Easy transport to the airport the next day. A shuttle bus this time with others. Overall much more than expected. Thanks to all.
title: Perfect for what it is

text:
Spent a night here on the way back from Bali, the road to this hotel was lengthy and traffic. the pick up was never there , so we took taxi instead. Took us 35 minutes to reach here from the airport. 

The lobby was small and the receptionist was slow. The room was the major disappointment, the carpet was dirty and the bathroom had a major stain problems. view from the room as the aircon and slum area. 

Breakfast was standard and limited choices available. 

The spa was a camouflage with brothel kind of service, yes i meant BROTHEL Stay away from here. Not a place for couple or families.
title: traditional dirty hotel

text:
The hotel is just enough for the night stay before you fly out of Jakarta.
Rooms are ok ok .. Rest. Is ok ok .. Wifi works some time and some time not ... 
The only advantage is very near to airport and they provide free shuttle to airport.

Secondly you can stay if you like to enjoy Spa   Sauna or juccazi in the hotel
title: Stay if want to stay near Airport

text:
I stayed here just for transit. Room and bath room is clean, nice, and modern. Hotel is clean and modern design. Restaurant has nice design and provide menus with reasonable price. Breakfast food is delicious with several menus provided. There shuttle bus provided from hotel to airport every hour. 

Hotel price rate is not high comparing with other hotels around with the same class. Also if consider all facilities and service given by this hotel, it is value for money. Very satisfied to stay in this hotel.
title: Good Hotel, Good Service, Very Satisfied

text: I stayed here for 2 nights, because i had an early flight in the morning. It took around 10-15 minutes to the airport. The room and the bathroom was clean, but unfortunately it lack the nice scent which often found in bigger hotel rooms. The AC and the traffic was not too noisy. The best part from this hotel is the food, they have a quite tasty food, especially the indonesian food. The staff was quite friendly, and it didnt take long for check in nor check out. Overall, its a decent transit hotel for business purposes.
title: Nice, decent, transit hotel

text:
although the location is near the airport, it took me 40 minutes to reach by long winding traffic road. The lobby was decent and the staff was friendly, but it took them 30 minutes to check me in as the room was not ready at 5pm. The room was smaller than I expected and the aircon was so noisy I couldn't sleep for quite some time.

After a long flight, one would get a massage to release all those tension, and so I did. What a surprise, the massage girl offered much more than that in exchange to big tips. I just need a real massage please.

so beware if you bring your family here..
title: dissapointing

text: Orchardz is quick to the airport and they have a reliable shuttle leaving on the hour. The ride to the hotel is a bit longer as you have to go out and then backtrack. The rooms are nice and new and clean- much better than the other surrounding hotels and a good value. There is a bar on the first floor- quiet, and a spa on the second floor for massages. The breakfast is decent- nothing amazing but easy if you have a flight to catch.
title: Great for airport access

text: There are a number of airport hotels near CGK, and Orchardz is a true gem.  It's quite new and everything was clean, attractive, and functional, with good service.  They had no problem with their shuttle picking us up at the airport well after midnight, though we did have to wait for a bit.  The shuttle did not drive up to the street level arrival -- the employee found us at the appointed location and escorted us on foot to where they'd parked.  Although the hotel is on the main highway, getting there is quite roundabout and goes through some small back streets.  However, getting back to the airport is a straight shot down the highway.  The room was simply, but tastefully appointed, with individual travel-size amenities, not to be taken for granted -- bar soap, shampoo, toothpaste, etc, as opposed to a big liquid soap dispenser.  There were even slippers.  The bathroom facilities were clean and functional.  The free breakfast was an impressive buffet of both western and Asian offerings.  Though the shuttle back to the airport seemed overbooked, they took care of us with a second vehicle.  Altogether, this is an impressive experience for an extremely reasonable price.
title: A Gem CGK Airport Hotel

text: Very good Hotel... Food are all delicious, the driver Mr. #panji and #puloh is very responsive and communicative when picking up us in air port sukarno hatta, they are humble person. And also the receptionist is good also
title: Hotel ORCHARDZ Bandara Sukarno Hatta

owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,

Warmest greeting form Orchardz Bandara Hotel,

Thank you for choosing our hotel and thank your for your advice.
we will make it better and better to serve our guests

regards
Dena Kusnadi
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: Good service, when ordering a hotel from the application, it was notified that it could shuttle the airport to the hotel.  when I was waiting for my luggage, I immediately called the hotel when I was at the pick-up location, immediately informed, the attitude of the driver from the hotel, who was quick to respond and updated the location, gave me comfort because of the friendly driver service, Mr. Panji, Mr. Puloh.  while at the hotel, the receptionist reminded me for a delivery to the airport.  while in the room the facilities at a superior level are equipped with a spacious room, refrigerator and hairdryer, water heater.
title: Best service and facility

text: Nice rooms, highly recommended! I was pleasantly surprised the accommodation was great. Definitely recommend to visitors. Thanks to all staff specially Mr. Usman is really helpful. Very satisfied with professional service.
title: Professional Service

text:
I've stayed here Twice, first on 20th January stayed in Deluxe, and 31th January stayed in Superior room..Both room was very nice, but I'm prefer stay in deluxe with more space and get sofa in the room..They also have free shuttle pick up and drop to airport,you just need to tell the front desk about the time.
i Will stay here again when im going to Jakarta..Thanks to all the staff
title: Very Good Hotel

text: Most welcoming hotel thanks to mr usman who is really helpful. Good service n place .good location. Enak buat stay overnight. Good room service. Nice interior. Nice facilities .. over all its goooooooòoooooooooooooooooooooooppoooooooooooooppooooooooooooooooooooooooddddddddddddddddddddddd
title: Nice place

text: I'm satisfied with this hotel. This hotel is clean, bathroom spacious, towels hetting a little tired though. staff are really friendly. Location also strategic very close to the airport. Thanks to Mr. Usman👍🏻👍🏻
title: Friendly Staff and Strategic Locatio

text:
Booked here last minute but still get to be picked up by Davi on time. Service in transportation is great. Very helpful and friendly.

Room wise, it is efficient. Even though small still fell spacey. AC working properly, water heater and water pressure is good. The shampoo and soap smell very good.
title: Great place good price

text: I stay in this hotel a night before continue my next flight. This hotel location is near with Soekarno Hatta Airport. This hotel is offering car/bus shuttle for free. I have ever picked up by Pak Davi. He was very cooperative, fast response, informative and friendly. Check in process was fast. The staff were friendly and nice. The room was clean and comfortable. This hotel is recommended for staying.
title: Stay due to transit

text: The hotel provides airport pick-up service. I was told to contact Mr. Panji and he picked me up from the airport and drove me to the hotel. Mr. Panji was very friendly, quick and helpful, he even informed me about eating places around the hotel. Mr. Puloh was also there to help me. The hotel is very pleasant and has a quick service. The hotel room was big and spacious, a great room to relax after a long flight. Hotel workers were also very friendly. The next day, I was transported back to the airport.
title: Great transit hotel with transport possibilities

text: Excellent service, shuttle booking from and to the airport was super easy and communicative (shoutout to Pak Davi), check in - check out process was convenient and the room is fitting! The bed was large - it fitted the three of us comfortably. The bathroom is clean and has all the amenities needed. Breakfast opens from 2.30 a.m and had a good variety of food! Super satisfied with our transit stay.
title: Good transit hotel!

text: Nice hotel transit near by the airport. They have a good room with a good connection wifi. They have free shuttle from the airport and to the airport, and that very helpfull. Special thanks to asep and rizal to help me with my luggage. And they have a really helpfull reception, specially danu and rafif. I will be back to here soon. Thank you all
title: Best Transit Hotel and Helpfull Staff

text: Clean room. Front office and staff are helpful. Shuttle to and from the airport is easy. My shuttle driver Panji is very helpful. I would highly recommend this hotel. Very close to the airport 20 min ride.
title: Excellent

text:

This hotel also gives various choices for the breakfast, such as fruits, porridge, veggies, chicken, etc which are very nice.  Their breakfast opens at around 2.30 am, so its a good choice for those who wants to leave early to catch the flight.

The staffs here are also very friendly, one of them is Agan (staff that works in breakfast section).
