text:
Very friendly and kind staff.
Very quick service for room service.
Clean room. The quarantine were not that great as there was not many options for vegetarians.
But overall the really friendly staff and welcoming nature made this a nice hotel to quarantine in. Very very close to airport as well- 15 min drive max.
title: Good hotel to quarantine in

text:
For the price you pay it's a very good hotel to relax between flights. Nice hot shower, comfy bed, clean rooms. The shuttle service was great to have. I was given a choice of breakfast menus and the hotel did well to cater to my vegan diet, I got a yummy nasi goreng and some fruit. 

The staff were very kind and helpful, I would come back again. The only downside for me was the room service menu didn't have anything vegan besides the French fries.
title: Great transit hotel

text: We are here as a transit hotel and recovery after 27 hours on planes . This place is near the airport and they have daily scheduled trips to the airport but the will also take you and pick you up when needed . We arrived just before midnight , a porter at the airport called the hotel and fifteen minutes later they picked us up . My room faced the airport but I never heard the jets landing. The rooms were clean , the traffic is hell so if you can avoid driving do it . The free breakfast buffet was better then what you might find at most hotels . They had plenty of western and Asian foods , the air condoning worked great all over the hotel . Be aware if you use the spa has good massages but they also offer extra special massages . My friend ( female ) was also going to get a massage and I told her it is not your traditional massage place . Don’t get me wrong I did get a good massage but some might be offended with what else they offer .
title: Easy 24 hour shuttle to airport

text:
This is a great transit hotel in Jakarta. 
They provide a complimentary shuttle to and from the airport. In our case, the shuttle driver was waiting for us with our names on the board.
While the room is a little dated, it is acceptable. The air conditioning was great give. The humid weather.
The breakfast offered lots of choices, local and continental.
title: Great transit hotel

text:
The check in and out was very breeze. The
 rooms are very clean and neat. The breakfast is served from 0230 hrs
which is very convinient for early check out.
Free shuttle service is provided to the airport every hour.
title: Hotel near airport

text:
I stayed at this hotel twice as I was travelling to and from Kalimatan.  It is close to the airport and there is free shuttle service every two hours.

I was pleased to be able to get breakfast even though I was leaving on an early flight.  They start breakfast at 230 to accommodate travellers.

Hotel was clean and a good selection of breakfast buffet items.
title: close to airport

text: Thank you for Danu the reception and the one on Check in time , i was so sick that time and we have to wait for the room but the reception allowed my mom and I to have the breakfast which is so appreciated and caring for them , the breakfast itself so wonderful with lots of variety . The room is clean and with adequate amenities, would like to stay there again for sure , with just lots of foodcourt and minimarket nearby its really convenient .They also assist us to go to the airport even the time is not availabke but they manage to help us , Once again thank you for your hospitality.
title: The Best transit hotel

text: We stayed here for only one night. The breakfast was excellent and the room was well cleaned. Free shuttle service to the airport is provided and the staff is very helpful in loading the luggage. It's definitely a very valued for money stay!
title: Excellent airport hotel

text:
2 weeks ago, i have spent one night at orchard hotel which is very close with Soekarno hatta airport. I choosen because the location is good for stay before catch up for my next flight. With some friends who join with me we decide booked w rooms with street view, room conditions is good and bathroom is clean. Breakfast is excellent. This hotel is close with some shop and small restaurant. There is some place for relax nearby like mall but  there are some restaurant, so will not boring if you just stay at hotel.
Last, they have airport shuttle that you can join and saved your money to book the taxi.
I will back for another if I have another transit in Jakarta.
title: Good hotel for transit!

text: I was booked 2 rooms. Rooms and beds are big. Very spacious. The bathroom shower was strong. I love it. Hotels provide breakfast start from 2.30 am. Shuttle bus every one hour to airport. Would come again.
title: Spacious rooms and various breakfast.

text: I and my husband have stayed Orchard Bandara Hotel few days ago to pick my family up at the Airport. We're so satisfied.We got clean room and nice bathroom.They has good taste food, friendly staff, strategic location, near to the airport. Next time will stay again, insya Allah.
title: Satisfied and Excellent

text: Good Hotel and pickup service 10mins to airport, large clean rooms, quiet with great breakfast. Close to a Mall which has mostly restaurants and cafes. Tried the fish restaurant DÇost, quite good and not expensive.
title: Good Hotel and pickup service 10mins to airport

text: This property is relatively near the airport but because of construction requires a round about way to arrive.  We took a Bluebird and it was just a 10 minute ride and was only like 10k.  The hotel is rated 3 stars but I'd say it's more like a 2 1/2 star by US standards and the rooms are a little more worn that the pictures would indicate.  The room was clean, but on the smaller side with a TV, a refrigerator but no room decorations.  The internet was fine but honestly we arrived later in the evening and left early in the morning so I'm sure there wasn't much traffic on it.  The staff was very friendly and fantastic to work with for a wake up call, breakfast and shuttle service to the airport.  Since it was Ramadan, breakfast started early at 2-2:30 something like that and had a good selection of Indonesia breakfast items.  I'd stay here again, if the rates were a little lower to reflect the actual quality of room but I'm not disappointed as it was good enough for one night.
title: Good place to stay for an overnight

text: Quite close to airport within 15mins car journey with cost Rp50,000 without meter. Big room, clean and basic room facility such as toothpaste, teapot. Quite good breakfast. Staffs are helpful. If you are looking for a good budget hotel within airport area, this is definitely a good choice.
title: 15 mins to airport with nice breakfast

text:
Orchardz Bandara, Jakarta is a very basic hotel. The plus point of this hotel is, that it is located near the Soekarno-Hatta International Airport. People often stay here who has to transit in Jakarta for a day or for some hours. They operate a free shuttle service to the airport but the last shuttle leaves hotel at 1 PM. If someone has an evening flight or late night flight, it means you have no option except leaving for airport at 1 PM. 

The buffet breakfast has limited items, most of the dishes were Indonesian. The floor I stayed at, was hell smelly. My check-in took 40 minutes because their system was not working and they had to re-start it again and again.
title: A basic transit hotel

text: We took the shuttle to and from the hotel. It was very convenient. Parking is limited. The hotel is clean and well managed. The staff are polite. Most speak English. The restaurant is excellent. Breakfast is included in the price. We appreciated out stay after the long flight from the USA. The hotel is quiet and a great place to get over jetlag before going on to other Indonesian islands.
title: Near Airport and a great stay

text: It took us around 30min to get from Gambir train station to the hotel (that was at 11pm without traffic) and we paid 130k IDR for Uber (including tolls). The hotel provides free airport shuttle service on hourly basis. It took around 15min with the shuttle to get the airport. The breakfast is from 2am to 10am and it was adequate. The room was a little bit outdated and our aircon did not work properly but for one night it was ok. I would say that the hotel is good enough for a short layover (and for the price).
title: Free airport shuttle

text:
I had an 8-hour layover in Jakarta before my flight home, but instead of going downtown (where I've been to before and I just hate the traffic) I preferred to while away the time at this hotel located 10 mins. from the airport.  Sure there are airport lounges available in CGK but none of them would have beds where you can really lie down and sleep. And since this is Indonesia, the cost of the hotel room was quite reasonable plus they offered free airport shuttle.  

Nothing special about the room, it was clean and decent, good and comfortable bed and pillows, mini-bar, cable TV, coffee and tea maker, in-room safe, soap and shampoo plus hair dryer.  Water pressure was great and the room AC had good controls.  Towels were kinda thin and worn out, and they need to be replaced.  Wifi was strong and reasonably fast.  

As I stayed just for 7 hours I didn't get to eat at their breakfast buffet so can't rate that.  There are few dining options around so I bought some snacks from the nearby Indomarket grocery.  The hotel staff, from the guy who met me at the airport arrival up to the front desk, were all very helpful and polite.

The place is certainly recommendable and would have no second thoughts about staying here again.
title: Nice place for a layover

photos.caption: Room desk, mini-bar and cable TV

text:
At the outset warning not to book online at websites it is much cheaper to book directly .Good Breakfast spread   and wifi ok .Early morning flyers will find it easier and comfortable but that is all about it.Full stop.
Rest not much to say about .
title: Just Ok

text:
This hotel is a great 5minute drive from the airport. It can be a little loud as it is located next to a busy road, but the noise was barely noticeable when trying to sleep.

The room was lovely and clean, great value for money with free airport transfers.

We had dinner here which again was fairly reasonably priced and tasted lovely. The staff at the restaurant are really friendly. 

Breakfast was basic but we couldn't have asked for more. Great that it is available for extended hours! 

Will definitely stay again if we are in transit.
title: Great location and clean!

text: Don’t really remember how many times I’ve stayed in this hotel, but still I like to come back and stay for another time. This time I requested the airport pickup service when booking the hotel, they sincerely asked my flight information on the traveling day, but because of the last minute changes, I informed them to cancel the pickup, then they replied politely. I arrived the hotel much earlier (10.00 AM), they allowed me to check in without any extra cost 👏; and the photo of their signature dish - Ox Tail Soup is as good as always, really tasty and I strongly recommend you give it a try. The only problem is I was staying in Room 309, for some reasons, the sound of this machine is really annoying, if the hotel is planning to sell this room, there should be a kind of compensation like discount etc., this is the only unpleasant experience during this stay, otherwise it should be a 4 star rating.
title: Regular Stay

text: Good enough for short stay. Very close to airport. Not sure about the building structure. My bed was shaking everytime big cars/trucks passed by. Not that I am complaining because I had a good night sleep just like a baby on vibrator chair lol it has quite variety of food for breakfast. Fancy coffee like cappuccino/latte are extra. Some hotel have that for free (included in your breakfast). I’d pay a little bit more to stay at swiss bell hotel airport next time.
title: You get what you paid for

text: We stayed two nights here the beds weed very comfortable, sheets really amazing, clean, quiet, very comfortable shower and bathroom. We ordered room service for dinner two nights in a row which was delicious. Staff very very helpful and nice.
title: Great transit hotel

text:
We stayed in this hotel as a family of four since our flight had to leave very early in the morning and we didn't want to take any risk with Jakarta traffic. Booking was very easy, check-in was like breeze and efficient, and we were given an option for morning call as well for the next morning.

We booked bigger room as we needed extra bed for our oldest son (11 years old), and the room was bigger than our expectation.  Extra bed came and was set up quickly, as well as our food (room service).  As a note, option for food is not a lot, but enough if you are not a picky eater.

Room itself was clean with electric kettle ready.  It was very quiet at night, being an airport hotel.  Bathroom was also big and clean with necessary toiletries provided. Towels are not very fluffy, but clean.  Very good pressure of water in the shower as well as hot water.  

Good channels on TV, much to our children amusement.

Hotel provides very early breakfast and shuttle starts at 3 am in the morning.  Not a very big spread of food, but enough for an early start.  Shuttle left hourly, big bus, and even though hotel is located just few minutes from airport, it took a bit longer to reach the terminal due to airport traffic.

Will we pick this hotel as transit hotel next time we go to Indonesia? Sure, why not.
title: Efficient

text:
I stayed here for 1 night while having a layover between flights at CGK airport. Meet and Greet and transfer to the hotel by minibus (at 10:30 pm) was flawlessly executed, and I was in my room within 45 minutes of touching down.

This is a modern 10-story hotel within 5-10 minutes drive of the airport. The local area is not very exciting, but most things you will need are available at the hotel. I asked for and received a room on the 10th floor, and it was very quiet. The room was modern and quite spacious, had all the facilities I needed, and everything worked well, including the excellent a/c and wi-fi. 

The complimentary breakfast was served in the restaurant on the ground floor and consisted of a buffet including local and European dishes. I found it to be more than adequate.

The hourly shuttle back to the airport was quick and efficient, and I will certainly stay at this hotel again. Well worth the very reasonable room rates.
title: Very Good, Inexpensive Hotel Near Jakarta (CGK) Airport

text:
Cheap, clean with great breakfast - plus a free shuttle to the airport.  Staff were super friendly and helpful. 
We tried the Padang restaurant next door- dishes were tasty but be warned all served cold in traditional style.

Would return in a heartbeat
title: What’s not to like

text: We stayed one night at the OrchardZ while transiting in Jakarta and found it both clean and comfortable. The hotel is ideally located near the airport and provides an hourly shuttle bus that is both reliable and comfortable. Many things could be said, but what impressed us most about this hotel was its well-trained staff. Whether at the reception desk, restaurant, in the hallways, or on the shuttle bus, they were service-oriented and always aimed to please. We enjoyed our stay and look forward to returning in the future.
title: Ideal Transit Hotel

text: I doubt if many people spent more than one night here. It is ideally positioned for a airport stopover and provides an hourly free shuttle to the terminals. Everything you need, including breakfast from 2:30am. Cafe restaurant a bit uninspiring for the evening, but enough for one night.
title: Ideal airport stopover

text:
This not my first time being here for my business trip. It’s a very comfortable place for short stays. They always keep the best for the guests. Especially for the breakfast, in my opinion orchardz still the leader for it’s peers in surrounding Soekarno Hatta Airport. 

It’s a pleasant staying here :)
title: Favorite transit hotel

text: this place is clean, everything was working properly, and the bed/sheets were comfortable. this hotel is close to the airport but not much else. The hotel offers free airport pickup and dropoff but the times are limited. breakfast options included indonesian food, omelette station, fresh fruit, and assorted pastries. wifi is strong. I am pretty happy with my stay here.
title: good transit hotel. free airport pickup/dropoff. good breakfast options

text: Orcharddz Hotel Bandara is along the highway near Sukatno Hatta airport. From Terminal 3 the hotel shuttle bus needs to make a big circle to get to the hotel. For an overnight stay to catch the next day's morning flight is not too bad. The front desk staffs are friendly and courteous. Rooms are clean and the bed comfortable.  Toilet is clean and dry snd the shower is strong. Comfortable stay it was.
title: Overnight Stay

text: Its a decent hotel just for transit purpose....the price is very reasonable with free airport pick up and drop service....their breakfast starts at 3 AM which helps a lot of people with very early morning flights....the airport is very close by
title: Transit Hotel

text: I'm happy to come back to this hotel, knowing that my wifi is reasonably fast and reliable. It didn't disappoint. My sleep was soundly on comfortable bed, bathroom was clean, wifi was as I remembered it, breakfast spread was good with live cooking station for eggs.
title: I have been back

text:
I have stayed in 2 others budget hotel in the area, and you can tell that orchardz is slightly premium than the others. It has a proper hotel functionalities i suppose but a bit worn out. I dont like the room design but the lighting by the bed make the ambience so cozy. It has basic amenities such as shampoo, soap/ shower gel, toothbrush set, tea, coffee, water, even slippers i guess. However to me for that kind of price and for that “hmm, well..yeah okay” room i dont feel like giving them an extra ordinary rate. 
They provide breakfast which is okay id you are local. If you are foreigners probably limited options such as bread or cereal. One thing they’re good at is about the shuttle announcement. They will have loud announcements on the lobby area to inform that shuttle is about to leave or please be prepared , etc. and it is going on for a few times
Oh and i was on 5th/6th floors, my room has view of the highway but the window is sealed perfectly because it is not noisy
title: Decent

text: Near the airport, provides shuttle bus service to and from the airport and starts their buffet breakfast at 3AM. As far as airport transit hotels go, there are no complaints here. Staff were friendly and could speak English fairly well.
title: Clean and Convenient

text:
3stars hotel but stay at there like stay at 4th star hotel for room and food. Love this place with bedroom spacious and comfort bed also the food is delicious. 

Near with soekarno harta airport and they have a free shuttle airport every hour. This hotel great for transit 

But a little point for services need to increase. Especially fo and fb staff
title: 3 stars hotel with spacious room, great place for transit (near with soekarno hatta airport)

text:
excellent location near to airport
efficient check in
on site restuarant with early buffet breakfast times 
great for airport transfers
free shuttle bus to the airport every hour
recommend this hotel
i will use again
title: airport transfer

text: Good hotel for overnight before or after a flight.  There isn't much around.  You can walk to the mall.  However, the breakfast is good and served from 2am!   The internet is fast and the staff is friendly.  The rooms are clean.  Free shuttle to/from the airport.
title: Fine hotel to overnight in for a flight.

text:
Room size ok. Water pressure is great. Hot water works perfectly.
Got hairdyer as well, very thoughtful from the hotel. Very friendly staff.
They have shuttle to airport every hour start from 3 am to 12 pm.
Breakfast start 2.30AM, which is great considering a lot of people checking out 4 or 5 AM. The room service is fast and taste good for the price.

The down side is the smell of the room is a bit old.
recommended for transit before your 1st flight.
title: Transit for 1st flight

text: Stayed for a night here cause I have to catch a very early flight the next day. It is truly close to the airport. The room is adequate, the bed is comfortable, the staffs are helpful. They also provide breakfast since 3 am in the morning to cater to those who are like me. The breakfast menu is quite good & taste good as well. Overall I had a very a good experience & truly recommend this place.
title: A very recommended airport hotel

text: I stayed here twice during my transit in Jakarta and it were satisfactory, very good value hotel with no hassle during check in and booking, very flexible and recommended for solo traveler who is looking for a quick and efficient stay or transit. food also great both in dining and room service. the cons only for the shuttle arrangement which is normally loaded due to freebies, I prefer to use private taxi for my convenience though so it was no big deal at all, great hotel and clean as well. keep up the good work and cheers
title: Good value, good service, efficient and good front desk associates

text: Stayed in this hotel before the transiting flight early next morning. Quite near the airport, only a 15 minuet drive by their free shuttle service. Simple but a clean room, cable TV, mini bar, massage is also available. The buffet breakfast menu is simple but is more than enough selections. Once again, I took their shuttle service back to the airport. The attitude of their staff are very friendly. This is the main reason I’ll be back.
title: One Night in Jakarta

text: Ok, just 10 minutes to airport, shuttle bus was on time, and just walking about 5 minutes to get local food, room was ok, clean, breakfast time very customer oriented, open at 2.30 am, so we can take first flight without any problem, but the taste of food not good enough, must have more varians
title: Good

text: I came late night at CGK Soekarno Hatta Airport of Jakarta in Tangerang and should catch the early flight on the next morning. I called Hotel and inform that I had come lately. The Hotel suggested me to use their free shuttle service then gave me the Driver phone number for communication easily when I arrived Jakarta. After landing, I send SMS to the Driver, suddenly he called me and told me that the car has already been ready in the Arrival Parking Area, really helping us. I stayed only 4 hours in this hotel and should be back to the Airport at 04.00 am. The free shuttle is started from 03.00 am and conducted every hours. The room is spacious and clean, the free breakfast is started from 02.30 am at Ritz Cafe. Good experience for transit at CGK Airport. Recommended.
title: The Best Service for CGK Transit Passengers

text:
Simple transit hotel with prices above average. They didn t help us and made us pay cancelation fees when our flight was delayed. I had similar experiences with other hotels who were more helpful.      
No nos ayudaron con los gastos de cancelacion cuando nuestro vuelo fue retrasado. Alegaron q no era posiblr, pero en otro hotel tuvimos una experiencia similar y lo resolvieron al instante                         .
title: Not helpful staff

text:
Plus :
Near Soekarno Hatta Airport with shuttle
Bfast start from 2.30 AM
Enough room good facilities
Helpfull staff
Simple bfast menu

Minus :
The pillows
Shuttle morning schedulle every 1 hours
Mostly peak seasson booked high rate
title: Simple transit hotel

text:
Arriving from Kuala Lumpur we stayed for one night before our transfer to Pangkalan Bun for Camp Leakey Orang utan. Fast transfer and reasonable room with wifi which was good after the non existent wifi of Sabah in Malaysian Borneo.
Went for a walk from the hotel but not much to do and the roads were busy and you felt slightly worried about the cars and motorbikes. Didnt find anywhere to eat so went back to the hotel for snack style dinner. Comfortable night sleep in a clean air conditioned room.
title: OK Airport Hotel

text:
we were traveling to Medan and had a short stopover for couple of hours in Jakarta. So it made no sense for us to take a hotel in the "Centre" of Jakarta cause of the unpredictable traffic. 
The hotel was very cheap, friendly and our room was very clean, a very comfortable bed and a very big bathroom which was very clean as well. 
the only disadvantage is the location of the hotel. there is not a lot to do outside just some small restaurants but like I said, if you are just looking for a good hotel for one night is this a hotel which I recommend.
title: transit

text:
I checked into orchard to avoid the Jakarta famous 'Macet' or Traffic Jam. It can take up to 3 hours from downtown to the airport. It took me only 15 mins from here. By the way...Bandara means airport..

The hotel is dated. However provided you with all the very basic needs. There is an ATM machine in the lobby.  Very convenient and safe.

Room. As mentioned the room is dated. So are the sheets and pillows. The towels provided does not absorb water well. However you have all the basics eg toothbrush. Shampoo and bath gel and a decent selection of cable channels.  

Tip.  The walls are thin. You can hear the kids running up an down the hallway. As well as your neighbours. Not a quite night for me. It was the school holidays. Lots of traffics in the hallway.  Ask them for the room at the end of the corridor...probably less noise..

Tip. There is a small kiosk 5 mins walk out of the hotel. To buy your basic drinks or hygiene stuff.

Food and Beverage.  They have a 24 hours room service. Reasonable menus. The breakfast is basic. But there is an egg counter. Meals catered for locals. Only toast and eggs avaliable for western. 

Tip at check out. Be early During the busy period. There are only 2 people at the counter. Juggling a group check out. And other guests. I kept reminding the front office assistant I was catching the 9am shuttle.  So was the other 3 people who was lining up to check out. I made a call before I check out. However that was not captured. Had to wait a while for them to settle.

Shuttle service was excellent! The driver was polite and extremely helpful. They should consider him as employee of the month. He ensure you are at rhe right stop as there are a few entrance in t1 and t2. The shuttle takes us from T1 to T3  all in 15 mins.
title: Thin walls...15 mins to airport...

text:
This is a good hotel close to airport, but their pickup service from the airport is not reliable.
Restaurant offers good quality food and the area is reasonably quiet. It takes long to get anywhere in Jakarta from there.
I have a problem with not finding comfortable chairs in a good hotel, this Orchardz was no exception. But the staff is very cooperative and brought me a reading chair.
Supplying an English-printed Jakarta Newspaper would be very much appreciated as this is an international business hotel, I assume??
title: Good, but a few flaws

text: We stayed for one night after arriving into Jakarta before leaving for Borneo. The hotel was more than asequate at a good price. While a little dated the room was large, good bed and shower. We had a prompt wake up call the following morning before a quick breakfast and then complimentary airport transfer. Breakfast was pretty good with fruit and fresh eggs as well as lots of local choices ofnoodles, rice, meat etc. Just for info taxi from the airport was 150,000 booked from the stand.
title: Good layover hotel

text: Is disgusting the hotel staff runs a taxi scam if you want to go to the airport from the Orchardz Bandara. I stayed there to meet up with a friend who was arriving a day later. However, I had organised to take a taxi to the airport to meet him. But the concierge told me the taxis to the airport are on a fixed price which was much higher than the metered rates. Nevertheless I accepted the exorbitant rate, but imagine my shock when the taxi driver charged me double that rate!  I cannot believe the hotel owner can allow this ripping off his customers. Don't stay there. There are many more transit hotels nearby.
title: Taxi scam - daylight robbery

text: I was help my guest to book his booking for 4 rooms and I have plan to have corporate with ORCHARDZ BANDARA HOTEL but their service so sucks. I tried to call the hotel for 10 times and nobody pick up my call. Once pick up my phone the operator Mr. Yopi did not even say sorry to me for late pick up and the sounds is unfriendly. I'm too upset with this service as hotelier. He should not act that kind of things. And I already make payment 1 week before my guest check in But Ms. Nining did not follow up my inquiries. I need my confirmation letter as proven that I already paid. But they took so long time to proceed. I believe they would do so fast if they sincere with their job.
title: Bad service in reservation & operator team works

text:
This is a pretty nice hotel. It's very close to the airport so that's a convenience (but only if you're only staying overnight! If you have time to see Jakarta, this isn't the ideal location to stay in as it is far from everything.) There is also a free airport shuttle! It starts running pretty early, but if it's not running early enough for your flight you can arrange something with the front desk easily.

The staff is nice and helpful, accommodations are nice (hot water, AC, cable, free wifi..) there are other cheaper options for the same amenities but with this hotel you save money and travel time (if you need to get to the airport). So it's like you're paying a little "extra" so you can save money and have convenience haha. About $50ish USD.

There is also a restaurant! A pretty good one too. And this is nice because there are not really places to eat around this area (industrial boonies). The food is a bit pricey but not too terrible. There is also a mini mart you could walk to in about 10-15 minutes for any other needs.

This is a great option for anyone needing to get to the airport :D

I had a pleasant stay
title: A Nice Airport Hotel

text: if you dont have much time to go downt town and have flight very early stay here!!...this hotel is new. the room nice, clean, larger, good ameneties (I like the soap!), friendly staff, nice food and beverages....suprised for me I can find ginger drink here too. the price is good enough. pick up to the airport....taking away for breakfast....satisfied!!
title: nice, clean and so closed to the airport!

text:
Room : 
My family  stayed in deluxe room, spacious with 1 queen-bed. Comfortable bed and pillows, soundproof window, large bathroom with powerful shower and standard bathroom amenities (hair-dryer, shampoo,shower gel, toothbrush). 
Shuttle service: 
They provide free shuttle service to the airport hourly from 03.00 a.m, make sure you make a reservation during check-in. And please come to the lobby 5-10 minutes before shuttle departure time-they leave just right on time (ours was on 4 a.m), which is good. Ah yes, you can ask take-away breakfast (fried rice) upon check-in. 
Downside : 
1) No shower cap in the bathroom. 2) If you drive your own car: Hotel location is at airport highway, and you'll easily go beyond it because they have no legend. If it happens, you have to turn around through a hectic village road and will take 40-50 minutes. 3) Like other airport hotels near Soekarno-Hatta airport, it's hard to find a restaurant around. There's 1 warung padang nearby (along a small road on the back or the hotel) with quite edible food, that's all .
title: Good transit hotel, on-time shuttle to the airport

text: What a great hotel for airport transfer. New, clean, suprisingly good service. Does everything it says on the can and more for a very reasonable price. Free shuttle takes 10 mins. Food was basic but sufficient.
title: Location

text:
I and my partner was looking for a hotel nearby airport, and the only place available was only at this hotel, so I decided to check this out.
After waiting some time for the pick up, but it never showed up. So we took a taxi instead, and it took us 35 minutes to reach because of traffic and lengthy road.

The lobby looked decent, nothing special. Check in was quite slow, but they were quite friendly. The room however, was much less than expected. The pictures on the web doesn't really represent the real stuff. The aircon was noisy too, 

After a long flight, I was excited to have spa with my partner so I can relax before my next flight, amazed I was they actually only have brothel type services. I quickly rushed out of the place, with disgust, and find spa at nearby hotel.
title: Prostitute covered like hotel

text:
It takes 5 mins from hotel to airport with their shuttle service.

Friendly staff will assist you during stay. Good food of breakfast. Clean and wide room. Great spa facilities. Fast internet connection

Unfortunately they have to fix their online reservations system. You should get cheaper rate on their website.

Please prepare your self if you need laundry service. Unofficial laundry will take around two days.
title: Recommended for travelers

text:
Bon hôtel de transit avant le début de notre périple en Indonésie. 
Et surtout un grand merci à notre chauffeur, Davi, qui   a réussi à nous retrouver à l'aéroport de Jakarta où l'on était perdu. 
Personnel à l'écoute.
title: Parfait

text: Bellissimo hotel con ottima colazione nei pressi dell aeroporto. Dotato di tutti i confort e molto moderno. I trasferimenti da e per l aeroporto sono inclusi quindi è un ottima scelta. È anche vero che la vista dalla stanza è orribile. Ideale come transito per una notte. Il ristorante dell albergo è mediamente caro perché intorno non c'è nulla.
title: Consigliato

text: Tout était parfait merci ! Les employés sont très serviables, le repas et petit déjeuner très bon (j'ai bu un jus de mangue INCROYABLE), chambre très propre et bonne literie. Le service de navette gratuite pour l'aéroport est super et rapide, le chauffeur Davi est très gentil et nous a bien aidé. Nous conseillons cet hôtel !
title: Parfait

text: Unser Fahrer Davi hat uns direkt am Flughafen abgeholt und uns auch direkt an den Eingang des Hotels gefahren. Es war eine angenehme und ruhige Fahrt, in nicht einmal 10 Minuten vom Flughafen bis zum Hotel Orchardz. Danke!
title: Fahrt zum Hotel

text:
Ho soggiornato una notte in qst struttura . La navetta era pronta e puntuale . 
L autista Mr. Davi inoltre è stato molto gentile. 
La stessa disponibilità ho riscontrato nel servizio ristorante , Ms. Yani .
Il buffet della mattina non è proprio ottimo , ma il menù a la carte è di un altro livello, complimenti allo chef .
FO Mr. Aman della receptionist è gentile e disponibile .

Pro : lo staff e il servizio, la vicinanza con l'aeroporto.
Contro : la struttura , la camera non è proprio come appare sulla foto .
title: Staff hotel eccellente, la struttura di meno

text: Terima kasih Bu Yani！酒店的服务周到热情，态度随和，让人有宾至如归的感觉，房间干净整洁无异味，洗漱用品更换及时，饭菜可口，有中餐可以选择，独立空调，WIFI信号稳定快速，性价比高，距离机场很近，出行方便
title: 酒店

text: 在我住宿期间服务到位，方便快捷，住宿卫生整洁，饭菜可口，服务人员微笑服务到位，真的很棒，下次住宿还会来这家酒店 谢谢 呀你 yani rahman debby
title: menginap

text:
xie xie gagan yani 1、环境优美，地理位置好，交通方便，房间舒适卫生，服务人员很热情，乐于提供各种帮助，早餐丰富。

2、设施很人性化，网络高速信号好，窗外风景好。

3、性价比不错，下次还要入住

4、这酒店让在外的人，感受到了归家的感觉：这里有住家的可口菜肴，这里有温馨如家的环境，还有那周到齐全的全天候服务。如果有机会，我还会来这里。
title: airport hotel transit

text:
在住宿期间，服务非常到位，她都解释十分清楚和明白。所有的客人都对他大力称赞，我在此更恭贺贵公司能聘请得一个出类拔萃的人才，他日一定能为公司取得更好的佳绩。
Xiexie yanie gagan vieroo
title: stay at orchardz

text: thanks yani 服务非常热情周到，房间干净整洁，服务人员都很热情，是一家不错的酒店，值得入住，希望大家能够来体验一下。
title: 服务热情周到

text: Zeker is leuk en geweldig service,het eten absoluut goed en keuzes zelf maken,vroeg ontbijten(uitgebrijd),en zeer handig als je verder moet reizen er is vervoer van het hotel die je gratis can brengen naar je terminal waar je verder moet reizen acceptabel prijs voor kamer die echt shoon en ruim.daar kan je je kennis maken met zeer sociaal personeel Anuar,ABD Rahman Yani komaf Asgarino van het restaurant. Kortom heb ik zeer positieve  ervaring.
title: Orchardz

text: Das Hotel ist schon etwas älter. Empfehlenswert ist der Deluxe-Room. Das Zimmer mit Bad waren gross und sauber. Der Preis war in Ordnung. Leider habe ich keine Bar entdeckt und habe dann ein paar Getränke unweit des Hotels im Indomarkt gekauft. Das Frühstücksbuffet war reichhaltig. Das Hotelpersonal sehr freundlich und sehr zuvorkommend. Der Spa war geschlossen
title: Hotel in Airportnähe

text: 我在这家酒店住了一个多星期，因为很多原因去中国的飞机停飞，我和我的很多朋友滞留在美丽的印度尼西亚首都雅加达，在我滞留雅加达的这段时间多亏了酒店服务人员的照顾，消除缓解了因为去不了中国的焦虑。在异国他乡，虽然我们热爱美丽的雅加达，可是也会思念远在中国的父母和朋友兄弟姐妹，也会想念中国的美食。酒店一楼餐厅的很多中餐和蘑菇汤还有水果都很好吃和中餐一样好吃，工作人员非常友好，非常热情。每天都服务很好，就像朋友和家人一样。谢谢yani asga rias 非常乐于助人，谢谢你们。
title: at orchardz AirPort hotel

owner_response.text:
早上好，

感谢您留在我们的地方。能够全心全意为您服务是我们的荣幸。
我们希望您能尽快与家人团聚。
感谢您对我们的意见。我们将进一步改善我们的服务。
乌节路机场酒店的热情问候
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Hotel pour un passage express avant de reprendre l'avion.
Doté de tout ce qu'il faut pour se reposer avant, et avec un personnel a l'écoute.
Possibilité de manger sur place y compris en room service.
Navette gratuite très pratique.
title: Très bon rapport qualité prix

text:
Das Hotel hat alles was man für eine Nacht zwischen den Flügen braucht. Kostenlosen Shuttelservice, 15 min Fahrzeit vom Flughafen, Frühstück gibt's ab 2:30 Uhr und es ist gut sortiert.
Die Zimmer sind sauber und ruhig. Sie haben Wifi & Tv.
Preis - Leistung passt.
title: Stop Over Hotel

text:
ジャカルタに着いた翌日に日帰りでジョグジャカルタへ行くスケジュールだったので、１日だけこのホテルに宿泊しました。送迎が無料なので、チェックイン時に空港行きのミニバスが何時出発か確認し、翌日空港まで送ってもらいました。
短い時間の滞在でしたが、部屋もきれいで快適に過ごせました。
title: 空港に近いホテル

text:
Super Hotel in Flughafennähe. Shuttle vom und zum  Airport klappt bestens. Es gibt schon um 2.30 Uhr morgens Frühstück. Auch der Preis stimmt.
Hardy, ein Boy an der Rezeption war super nett und hilfreich. Er half uns einen Flug zu stornieren und einen anderen neu zu buchen für den nächsten Tag.
title: Eine gute Wahl für einen Tag zum Übernachten

text:
騒音で一睡も出来なかった。
朝食は朝３時から可能。
空港からホテルやホテルから空港の送迎は無料なので便利。
部屋がきれいなだけに騒音で一睡も出来なかったのが残念。
title: 騒音で眠れなかった

text: 空港送迎が無料なのがありがたい。また、朝食も無料のビッフェスタイル^_^毎回ジャカルタに来たら泊まっています。二階にはマッサージがあります。
title: 良いホテル

text: ジャカルタでのトランジットのために１泊しました。空港送迎もサービスに含まれているのですが、ピックアップは２日前くらいにホームページ経由でリクエストを送ったのですが届かなかったのか来てくれていませんでした。朝食を早朝３時くらいから食べられるのがいいと思いました。ブッフェスタイルですがいろいろ種類があってよかったです。少し歩いたところに小さなAirport Hubという小さめのショッピングモールがあって、夕食はそこで食べました。いくつかのレストランとコンビニ、ＫＦＣ、スタバ、ドーナツショップなどがありました。
title: トランジットにいいホテル

text:
공항 근처에 위치하고 있고 무료 픽업을 제공해서 단기간 묵기에 적절합니다.
조식도 붙고 방도 가격대비 넓직해서 나쁘지 않았습니다.
title: 공항 근처의 경제적인 호텔

text: 空港からタクシーで１０分くらいで行けて便利です。ただ、けっこう年期が入っており、清潔感はいまひとつという感じでした。
title: 空港から近くて便利

text: 空港の近くで無料送迎があるのでいつも利用しています。部屋も綺麗で値段も安くコスパが高いです。但し、近くに食事所があまりないのでホテルのレストランの利用となります。
title: コスパ高いです。

text:
Orchardz Bandara這家酒店離CGK機場很近，免費提供機場接駁班車。
房間和浴室大致清潔。
重點很早就供應早餐，對要搭早班飛機的人，很方便。
title: 離CGK機場很近而且很早就供應早餐

text:
El hotel está bien, sin más. 
La habitación es cómoda y limpia. La cama bien, las almohadas regular.
Solicitamos el transfer desde el aeropuerto al hotel unos dias antes de llegar. Tardamos unos 15-20 minutos en llegar, entre el tráfico y la situación del hotel.
Como solo estuvimos una noche, al hacer el check-in solicitamos también el transfer de vuelta. Los horarios son cada hora en punto, desde madrugada casi.
Lo que menos me gustó y que le resta puntuación son dos cosas:
El sonido de la mezquita cercana, que parece que está dentro de la habitación. ¡¡¡Y a las 4:30 de la mañana¡¡¡ Sin comentarios.
El desayuno es horrible. Tipo buffet, pero solo tenía comida local. Solo unos croissants, que estaban pasables. El café ni para limpiar el suelo.
title: NORMAL

text:
Wir waren hier für eine Nacht vor unserem Heimflug.
Das Hotel scheint mal renoviert worden sein, aber den Rauchgeruch bekommt man aus dem Gemäuer nicht mehr raus. Die Einrichtung ist modern und die Zimmer sauber.

Das Frühstück ist (wie in ganz Indonesien) gewöhnungsbedürftig.
Der Preis ist in Ordnung.

Für eine Nacht ok, aber nicht länger.
Teilweise Empfehlung!
title: Airporthotel halt

text:
Nous avons réservés une nuit dans cet hôtel proche de l'aéroport car nous étions en transit à Jakarta. 
Un chauffeur est venu nous chercher avec la navette, la chambre était assez grande, seule petit bémol il y a des chambres fumeurs..., douche très propre et spacieuse.
Très bon petit-déjeuner avec beaucoup de salés mais également du sucré.
title: Très bon rapport qualité prix

text: Abbiamo scelto questo hotel vicino all'aeroporto per esigenze di spostamento e non potevamo capitare meglio nella zona, visto il prezzo poi...che include un ottima colazione disponile dalle 2 del mattino alle 11 per ogni gusto, servizio navetta  per l'aeroporto  ....Stanza pulita con ogni comfort e ristorante interno aperto fino a tarda ora...molto buono!!
title: SOGGIORNO DI UNA NOTTE

text:
Es gibt fast nichts zu bemängeln. Wir haben das Hotel im Rahmen eines Stopovers in Jakarta gebucht und waren eine Nacht da. 
Wenn man es anmeldet, wird man direkt am Flughafen abgeholt. Das Abendessen war okay, kann man durchaus mal essen - Preise waren auch in Ordnung!
Die Lage ist in der Nähe des Flughafens in direkter Umgebung zu weiteren Flughafenhotels. Wenn man einen längeren Aufenthalt in Jakarta vor hat, würde ich aufgrund der Verkehrssituation ein Hotel in der Innenstadt empfehlen.
title: Super Hotel in der Nähe des Flughafens

text:
Ottimo punto di appoggio per una pausa tra un volo e l'altro. Vicino all'aeroporto di Giacarta, con possibilità di cenare a qualunque ora (abbiamo cenato all'una di notte, piatti piuttosto semplici ma buoni). La colazione era inclusa nel prezzo e partiva dalle 3 di mattina. Colazione non eccelsa. Possibilità di utilizzare navetta per trasporto all'aeroporto. 
Personale gentile e efficiente, consigliato.
title: Ottimo hotel per una notte

text:
Ad un prezzo modesto questo hotel vicino all'aeroporto di Jakarta ci ha offerto un impeccabile servizio Navetta: puntuale, pulito e ben organizzato, all'arrivo ci hanno aspettato con un cartello con scritto il nostro nome. Il giorno dopo alle 3 in punto, come da prenotazione alla reception, la navetta ci ha riaccompagnati in aeroporto al terminal giusto per il nostro volo.
Staff sempre sorridente, gentile e pronto a soddisfare ogni nostra richiesta e ad aiutarci, hanno sempre risposto alle mail inviate anche dall'Italia.
Camera pulita e con tutti i confort necessari (set di cortesia, ciabatte, phon, spazzolini e dentifricio, cassaforte, aria condizionata).
Buona e varia la colazione (salato, dolce e frutta) disponibile dalle 2:30 della mattina!!  Ci siamo riempiti la pancia con soddisfazione prima di riprendere l'aereo per ripartire
La Spa, compresa nel prezzo, non la abbiamo provata..

Se avete bisogno di un appoggio a Jakarta, in prossimità dell'aeroporto andate a colpo sicuro!
title: Ottima scelta!

text: Viel niet tegen. Hele ruime kamer, schoon en netjes en dicht bij het vliegveld. Goede prijs-kwaliteitverhouding. Ontbijt redelijk maar niet bijzonder. Hadden dit via Traveloka geboekt en hoewel we dat zeer kort van tevoren hadden gedaan ging inchecken vlekkeloos
title: Hele ruime kamers

text:
深夜から早朝のコタには良からぬ輩が出るらしいので、早朝便の利用の際に宿泊した。
周辺には何もないが最低限必要な物はそろっている。寝酒くらい買っておけばよい。
１階のレストランはナシチャンプルが紅茶付きで55,000ルピア。味は普通。
但しプロモーションメニューは表だけに掲示してあり、レストラン内のメニューにはない。ぷちぼったする気まんまん。
１時間おきに空港送迎バスが出ているので便利、7時のANAなら5時発のバスに乗れば余裕。
title: 悪徳警官対策

text: 客室は極めてシンプルな作りですが、清潔ですし、床は木のフローリングと自分の好み。好ましいのは、幅2mぐらいのデスクがあり、しかも3つもコンセントがついているのは機能的でよかった。さらに、午前3時から朝食が始まるので、6時台の飛行機でも朝食を食べてから搭乗できます。
title: シンプルで機能的、かつ超早朝対応。

text:
공항에서 가까운 곳을 고르다 선택한 호텔. 그냥 하루 잠깐 묵기에만 괜찮음. 그런데 주변에 여러 호텔도 비슷한 분위기. 주변에 편의점 한 개 있고 갈만한 곳 없음. 앞은 고속도로 뒤엔 로컬 노상식당들. 
1층 카페 겸 식당은 그런대로 괜찮았는데 의자가 너무 지저분함. 조식이 새벽 2시 반부터라 그 점은 유용할듯.
title: 하루 묵기에만 괜찮은 호텔

text:
ジャカルタからランプンのトランジットで利用しました。
深夜1時に到着して、5時に出発するスケジュールだったので滞在時間は僅かでしたが快適に過ごせました。
朝食は2時半から食べられたので、早朝の出発でもしっかり食事も取れました。味も良かったです。
空港までのシャトルバスが出ているのでとても便利ですが、全てのターミナルを巡回するので、時間は余裕をもって乗った方が良いと思います。
title: 空港近くのホテル

text: Останавливались в данном отеле в ноябре 2017. По воле случая оказались в Джакарте проездом, нужно было где то остановться на 2 ночи. Недалеко от аэропорта, это и было главным критерием поиска. Кровать в стандартном номере очень большая. Мы спали с мамой и 2 детьми. Папе принесли экстрабед (19 долларов сутки, включен завтрак). Номер стандартный поменьше джуниора, причем намного меньше. В стандартном было тесно, а в джуниор очень даже комфортно. Мебель относительно новая, все работает исправно. Завтраки хорошие, для такого небольшого отеля показалось что очень разнобразный ,с 4 видами фоуктов. Также яичница, омлеты, сосиски, десерты. Сьездили в Аквариум на нижнем этаже тц Сохо, рядом с тц ЦентралПарк. Ехали по пробкам около 40 минут. Отель понравился, рекомендую!
title: Отличный отель за свои деньги

text:
Al buscar un hotel cerca del aeropuerto, nos llamó la atención la apertura de los desayunos a las 2.30 am y logicamente el transfer gratuito para volar, tanto a la llegada como a la salida. Esta a 5 minutos andando de un pequeño centro comercial donde tienes para comer. También un par de Indomarket.
A más de media hora en taxi al centro. Habitaciones limpias, corresponden a las imágenes de booking. Baño con ducha y limpio. Desayuno buffet correcto.
Los horarios del transfer a la perfección. ideal para lo que es y perfecta relación calidad-precio.
title: Buena solución

text:
Vista la vicinanza con l'aeroporto abbiamo pensato di passare una notte in questo hotel per poi prendere un volo interno il giorno dopo..
Le stanze sono pulite, il bagno è grande e la colazione al mattino era buona ed abbondante!!
title: Una buona permanenza

text: スカルノハッタ空港の無料往復送迎があるホテルです。スタッフの対応も良かったです。ドライヤー、冷蔵庫、湯沸かしポットもありました。
title: 空港近くのトランジット最適ホテル

text: トランジットに利用しました。近隣のスイスベルやイビスバジェットと比してコスパは一番良いと思います。空港への送迎バスは1時間毎に出ています。朝食メニューはそれなりですが、問題ないです。部屋も価格以上の設備でした。
title: コスパばっちり、朝食も早朝から営業しています。

photos.caption: 空港バスの時刻表です。（左：ホテルから、右：空港から）

text:
Wir hatten das Hotel als Übergangslösung gebucht, unter anderem weil es einen kostenlosen Airport-Transfer angeboten hat. Leider konnten wir den Service nicht in Anspruch nehmen, da das Hotel nicht per Mail zu erreichen ist. Ein "no go" in der heutigen Zeit. Daraufhin haben wir uns ein überteuertes Taxi nehmen müssen - Den Preis hatten wir abgesprochen, bevor wir in das Taxi eingestiegen sind- jedoch mussten wir dann doch mehr bezahlen als vereinbart. Bei dem Problem erhielten wir keine Unterstützung vom staff, im Gegenteil, der Staff unterstützte die Haltung des Taxifahrers.

Eine kleine Entschädigung, z. B. in Form eines Drinks, für die nicht erbrachte Transferleistung wäre schön gewesen, leider vergeblich.

Das Hotel als Übergang ist ausreichend. Die Matratze war leider ein wenig hart. Das Zimmer ansonsten sauber.
title: Mittelmäßiges Hotel für walkover

text:
Nous avions réserve cette chambre car nous étions en transit à jakarta. L'hôtel a envoyé quelqu'un pour venir nous chercher, la navette est gratuite, à aller et au retour, et le personnel sérieux et souriant.
La chambre est propre, grande et nous n'avons pas été déçu.. le seul,petit bémol, on entend les personnes susceptibles de partir dans la nuit.mais franchement vu le prix 34 euros, auncun regret sur notre réservation.Petit déjeuner correct et bon restaurant.
Nous rereserverons à notre retour sans hésiter..
title: Très bon rapport qualite-prix

text:
Premetto: l'hotel è stato scelto esclusivamente per il servizio di navetta gratuito da/per aeroporto in considerazione del prezzo leggermente più vantaggioso rispetto ai vicini hotel che offrivano il medesimo servizio (ibis & co.).
Sebbene avessi più volte contattato l'hotel per comunicare il mio orario di arrivo (l'ultima volta la mattina stessa) e nonostante loro mi avessero prontamente confermato il servizio di pick-up specificando che mi avrebbero aspettata con cartello alla mano al terminal 1C, al mio arrivo non ho trovato nessuno. Ho aspettato una ventina di minuti ma del servizio pick-up neppure l'ombra.
Abbiamo dovuto prendere un taxi al costo di 100.000 rupie per ricevere, una volta arrivati in hotel, un semplice "scusa". Nessun servizio opzionale offerto per rimediare al disguido ne' tanto meno alcun minimo accenno al rimborso taxi (come invece ho letto avvenire in alcuni hotel concorrenti).
Insomma servizio pessimo e al dir poco insicuro: cercate altrove se desiderate questo tipo di trasferimento.
Se invece siete maschietti e desiderate divertirvi all'interno della SPA questo è l'hotel che fa per voi: le prostitute vi attenderanno.
Eh sì, avete letto bene, mi sono recata all'ingresso della SPA per richiedere qualche informazione ma mi è stato specificato che il servizio è per soli uomini e a giudicare dalla musica ad alto volume e dalla quantità di fumo presente nell'area non deve essere stata una vera e propria area benessere.
In compenso camere pulite (per gli standard indonesiani) e colazione a partire dalle 2e30.
title: Servizio pick-up saltato e prostitute

text:
空港直近で便利です。
近隣のSwiss-Belhotel Airport併設のショッピングモール「Airport Hub」も近いですし、近くにはローカルのシーフードレストランも多くあり、便利です。
スタッフの中にきびきびと対応する人がいて、気分がよかったです。
部屋の広さもトランジット用としては充分ありましたし、清掃も申し分ありませんでした。
この金額で空港直近で前泊できるのであれば、大満足です。
title: 快適に滞在できました

text: Hotel situato a pochi km dall'aeroporto, comodo se si ha un volo il giorno successivo (meno se dovete visitare Jakarta .. circa 1 ora con il taxi). Navetta gratuita messa a disposiIone dei clienti dell'hotel. Bella struttura, pulita con bagno in camera (doccia spaziosa con ottima pressione), TV satellitare e frigo bar. Personale cordiale e sempre sorridente. Ottimo prezzo 33€ (booking) con colazione inclusa. Colazione a buffet abbondante e varia ma qualitativamente inferiore rispetto ad altri hotel in Indonesia. Cena al ristorante discreta ma niente di particolare.
title: Ottimo hotel vicino all'aeroporto

text: スカルノハッタ空港の近くに滞在する時はいつもここ。今回は、チェックイン時にちょっとイラつくフロントが1人居た(ラマダン中)が他のフロントは丁寧な対応だった。ちょっとイラつくフロントには1秒位睨んでから話すと対応が良くなって来た。(私は180cm100Kg)  部屋は適度な広さ綺麗で掃除も行き届いている。冷蔵庫は気持ち程度大きさでロックしてあったフロントに連絡して開けてもらった。ベッドは硬めで快眠出来た。朝のバイキングは3時からでうれしい。私の舌には合う味。空港へのシャトルバスもあり便利。
title: いつもの

text: 空港の最寄りのホテルの一つです。トランジットの際に利用しました。これまで近くにあるibis sytleを利用していましたが、今回は気分を変えてこのホテルを利用しました。Terminal3からシルバーバードタクシーで41,000ルピアでした。他の方もコメントされていましたが、宿代はリーズナブルで清潔なホテルだと思います。水のしたたる音で眠れないなどということもありません。次回も利用しようと思います。
title: 空港からタクシー（silver bird)で41,000ルピア

text:
Voor op door reis is dit een mooi hotel.
Bij aankomst op het vliegveld was het even lastig zoeken naar de shuttle bus van het hotel.
Als je belt bij aankomst dan wordt je opgewacht door de schuttle.

Mooie kamers en heel ruim. Goeie bedden.
Ondanks dat het naast de snelweg ligt, goed geïsoleerd dus geen last van het verkeer.

Vriendelijk personeel en regelen netjes vervoer naar het vliegveld.

Bar en restaurant ook heel goed.

Spa en massage op de 2de verdieping
Helemaal top.
title: Dichtbij het vliegveld.  Schoon en netjes.

text:
2回目の利用です。
そばにショッピングモールがあり、お土産も購入可能です。
入口からは遠いので裏の車の出入り口からは入るのが近いです
また、モールの裏にコンビニもあり、ここでも買い物が出来ます。
title: 空港そばの快適なホテル

text: 今年10月,經由這家旅館網站用信用卡預訂房間, 入住時櫃台人員告知, 尚未從信用卡扣款, 我要先付款才能入住, 於是付現金入住, 一個月以後拿到信用卡帳單才知, 入住3週以後又從我的信用卡扣款, 不幸的我沒有留下付現金時的收據, 經由電子郵件要求退款, 旅館會計人員答應要查, 己過了一週沒有回覆, 我猜應該是拒絶退款了.
title: 經由這旅館網站預訂房間時要小心!

text:
空港周辺ホテルは玉石混淆というのが経験上の感覚です。ほとんどのケースが、名前の知られたホテルは安心ですが宿代はそれなりに高い一方、安いところはアクセスに問題や不衛生であったりということが多いです。ここのホテルは宿代はリーズナブルですが部屋は綺麗です。

水回りも問題なく、湯量、湯温、排水も問題ないです。
タオルもきちんと洗濯されていて嫌なにおいもありません。部屋で使えるスリッパも用意されています。

ベッドの寝心地はまずますで快適だと思います。朝食は朝３時からとることができますので早朝のフライトでも温かいものが食べられます。種類も割と豊富で味もそれなりにいけます。
空港へはシャトルバスで案内してくれます。英語でのアナウンスが丁寧にされないので、乗る飛行機会社の場所できちんと降りられるように確認するとよいと思います。

いずれにしても宿代からすれば十分に満足できるものでした。

深夜に到着したので迎えのピックアップをお願いしていました。返答がなかったのであきらめ、空港ではうまく会えなかったのですが、きちんと対応してくれていました。

また、機会があれば使いたいと思うホテルでした。
title: ありがちな名ばかり空港近くのホテルとは一線を画す

photos.caption: スリッパの用意もあります
水回りも問題ないです
画面の大きいテレビもあります
ベッドの寝心地は悪くないです
朝食です（種類が豊富です）

text: Das Hotel hat eine Top Lage (10-15 min zum flughafen) für alle die dieses Hotel als Ruhemöglichkeit für einen Weiterflug sehen. Zudem sehr saubere zimmer und netten Room Service. Der unkomplizierter Flughafentransfer (einfach vorher anrufen) war sehr stressfrei.
title: alles in Ordnung

text: 全く読めないジャカルタの渋滞でたまにスムーズだと空港に近いところで時間を潰したい。FM7も空港に近いのですが、出てから渋滞でヒヤリとする事がありました。ココなら大丈夫です。2階にスパがあります。
title: 空港への渋滞対策に

text:
早朝出発に備えて、搭乗前日の夜にチェックイン。
予約サイトからのブッキングで、200,000IDRの保証金を求められました。(チェックアウトの時にちゃんと戻って来ます)
部屋は快適、清潔、シャワーもベッドもエアコンもWIFIも問題なし。
空港への送迎バスも綺麗です。
1Fのレストランで夕食を摂りました。オックステールのスープとライスのセット。とても美味しかったです。(105,000++)
2FにSPAがあります。マッサージも受けれます。
長居をするには不便ですが、早朝出発の時はまた利用したいです。
title: 快適なホテル

text: Voor die prijs is het prima ,het personeel en bediening restaurant prima . Voor een wachttijd op een volgende vlucht is het ok . Een te veel betaalde rekening voor het restaurant wat ik niet wist is later netjes aan mij terug gegeven . De ophaal bus werkt goed .
title: Transit stop

text:
ジョグジャカルタからJAL成田行き早朝便へのトランジットで利用しました。
スカルノハッタ国際空港ターミナル3はオープンはしてますが、まだ周辺道路が工事中の為と、一方通行の為、大回りして行くのでホテルまでは20分位かかりました。ホテルまでの送迎は無料なので、送迎をお願いしました。飛行機が30分位遅延しましたが、ちゃんと待っててくれましたので、本当は無料でしたが、ドライバーさんに気持ちで1万ルピアを渡しました。タクシーで行くとメーター使用で3万ルピアはかかると思います。逆に空港へ行く場合は5分で行けます。朝3時半にモーニングコールをお願いして、時間通り起こして貰え 朝食も種類が価格の割には多く、美味しくいただきました。珍しく何の不満も無く、満足いくクオリティのホテルでした。
またトランジット等の時は必ずこちらのホテルを利用したいです。
title: ジョグジャカルタ便のトランジットで

text: 深夜到着翌朝午前4時チェックアウト、3時間の睡眠のために宿泊しました。同グループが３組三日に分かれて宿泊したのですが、私は最終組。1組目2組目空港迎え現れず、それを聞いて、再度念には念を入れてホテルに迎えの依頼確認、もし現れなかった際にはTripAdviserにReportすると書いていたら、深夜12時半の空港出口にお迎えの男性が！他の面では全く問題無く、部屋も快適、フロントの応対も大変快活で感じよく、早朝チェックアウトのためのお弁当も本当に簡単ではありますが作ってくれましたし、午前4時の空港シャトルバスも問題無く手配されていました。ﾅｼｺﾞﾚﾝとﾁｯﾌﾟｽだけの朝食、意外においしかったですよ。空港迎えさえ確実ならばまた利用しても良いかなと思います
title: transitには便利

text:
日系のエアラインで早朝に宿泊される方にお勧めです。現在早朝便の乗客を狙い撃ちにした悪徳警官の恐喝が横行し中にはATMへ連れて行かれて日本円で１０万円などの金額を脅し取られる事件が頻発してます、飛行機の出発時間に間に合わないように因縁を付けるのが彼らの手口です。市内のホテルからの移動中のタクシーを狙い撃ちにしてますのでこのホテルなら空港近くですから大丈夫です。　悪徳警官はビジネス主張者や観光客にまでKITSを提示せよとか言いますからたちが悪いです。
このホテルは最近出来たホテルで部屋も清潔です。
title: 早朝便にお勧め

text: Funktionierender Shuttle-Service, anständiges Personal, normal gute Zimmer und eines der besten indonesischen Frühstücksbuffetts, die ich gesehen habe. Trotz der Lage am Flughafen nicht laut. Sehr gut für eine Nacht zwischen zwei Flügen.
title: Übernachtung zwischen zwei Flügen

text:
L'hotel si trova nei pressi dell'aeroporto e mette a disposizione delle navette gratuite, che devono essere prenotate il giorno prima.
Nonostante sia vicino sia all'aeroporto che a una strada trafficata, non si sente nessun rumore in camera e il comfort è elevato.
Camera in ordine, pulita e spaziosa.
L'hotel dispone di ristorante al piano terra, essenziale perchè nelle vicinanze non ce sono molti.
title: Molto comodo per l'aeroporto

text: Провели в отеле одну ночь между перелетами. Отель неплохой на одну ночь и дешевый. После прилета попытались заказать шаттл из отеля в аэропорт - оказалось, что доставка из аэропорта производится каждый час, но где останавливается заветный автобус мы так и не поняли - прождали в разных местах около час и поехали на такси 150 000 рупий. Совет: при бронировании просите выслать карту аэропорта с указанием места остановки шаттла до отеля или тоже придется тратится на такси. С доставкой утром в аэропорт никаких проблем не было- шаттлы ходят каждый час. Вечером по пробкам дорога до отеля заняла почти час! Утром без пробок 10 минут. В номерах курят, белье и полотенца чистые, номера не новые, но и не убитые. Wi-fi бесплатный. Дали ваучер на 70000 на ужин, ресторан средний: один раз поесть можно, вдвоем три блюда и два коктейля - 1200 рублей.
title: Отель на одну ночь

text: 距離は近いのに道路が右折できないため、空港からは少し時間がかかりましたが、空港へ向かうにはすぐでした。きれいなビジネスホテルという感じでトランジットにいいホテルだと思います。面倒だったので、食事はホテルでとりましたが、価格は手頃で味もまあまあでした。近くにコンビニやドメスティックな食堂もありました。
title: 空港に近いきれいなホテル

text: Escogimos este hotel ya que llegabamos a Yakarta por la noche desde Madrid y a la mañana siguiente teniamos un vuelo a primera hora destino a Yogyakarta. El hotel esta al lado del aeropuerto y la gran ventaja es que dispone de transfer gratuito aeropuerto-hotel-aeropuerto. Las habitaciones están limpias y el desayuno es correcto.
title: Buena relación calidad-precio

text:
ジャカルタは、交通渋滞が凄いと言う事で、日本からジョグジャカルタへ行くために、一泊。と思い、泊まった宿。空港から、タクシーで６００００RP（５４０円程度）程度。側道をぐるっと回るので、結構時間かかりましたが、それでも宿泊代が安くて、空港に近い。帰り（空港へ）は、Hotelのバスで、エアーポートまで送ってくれました。
できて間もないHotelなのか、とてもきれい。ドメスティック向け（インドネシア人が殆どでした）ですが、快適でした。歩いて、３分のところにコンビニもあります。
９階で、眺めも良かったです。勿論、朝食付き、WIFIも使えます。
トランジットホテルとしては、ベストでしょう。
title: ジャカルタ　エアーポート近くのトランジットHotelとしては、最高

text: Escogimos este hotel para hacer noche, ya que teníamos otro vuelo por la mañana. El hotel es cómodo y su transfer gratuito funciona correctamente. Atención amable y desayuno pobre y con olor a fritanga de buena mañana. Aunque no estuvo mal del todo.... supongo que no volvería. Debe haber mejores opciones.
title: Buen transfer

text:
次の日、早朝便なのでこのホテルを利用しました。シャトルバスが１時間おきに出ていて、空港へ行くのに便利です。
昨年の１２月に開業したとか、新しいので気分がいいです。部屋は清潔、寝心地もよし。
受付、皆よく教育されてるのか、みな笑顔で応対。これも気分よし。
宿泊費、朝食付きでUSD５０少しですから、まあコスパ、こんなもんかな。
朝食はさすがローカル向け、日本人にはちょっと物足りないでしょう。でも、期待する必要も無いでしょう。
コンビには歩いて５～６分のところにありますが行きませんでした。次の日に備えて寝るだけです。ここで十分です。CGKの近くでしたらこの次も迷わずここにします。
title: 新しい、近い、清潔、気分がよい
